Now she requested for a loan of PKR 30,000 to purchase a cow and feed for its calves. She hopes to increase milk production capacity, which ultimately helps in generating more cash. She dreams of providing quality education to her children for their prosperous future.

loans.use: to purchase a cow and feed for its calves.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa is a hardworking mother from Manila, Philippines. This is her fifth loan cycle and she is convinced that her loan is always helping her, not just in her business but also with her family's everyday expenses. There are times when her sales aren't good but her hopes are always high that God will help her through. She continues to work hard for her family's sake.

She would now like to apply for a 12,000 PHP loan to buy additional stock of decorative plastic flowers and plants needed in her business. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help her to cover their daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Elsa's dreams is to be successful in life and business. She meets with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her life and business. She draws strength and inspiration from the fellowship and from the word of God that she studies. 

*All CCT community partners and clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet weekly. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and pay back microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional stock of decorative plastic flowers and plants needed in her business.

loans.name: Maureen

texts.en: Maureen is 35 years old and married to Newton. They have been blessed with three children of the following ages 11, 8 and 5 years.She sells fish and has been in this business for 11 years. She now earns a monthly income from the business of KES 20,000.She is borrowing a loan of KES 30,000 which she intends to use to purchase more fish.She plans to start another business from the anticipated profit.This is her first loan and her dream and hope is to have a better life.

loans.use: To boost her business by purchasing more fish to sell.

loans.name: Muzaffar

texts.ru:
Музаффар является опытным земледельцем, проживающим в селе района Носири Хусрав. Ему 43 года. Он женат и является многодетным отцом. У него семеро детей. Музаффар арендует 2,5 га участка земли, на котором выращивает  бахчевую культуру, хлопок и пшеницу. Он занимается земледелием уже 7 лет. Ему в деятельности помогает жена и один сын. Старший сын находится на заработках за пределами страны. Остальные дети школьники. 
Музаффару сейчас необходимо обработать землю минеральными удобрениями, чтобы получить хороший качественный урожай арбуза и дыни. Он просит кредит для приобретения минеральных удобрений и топлива. 
Его цель на будущее - приобретение земли и расширение деятельности.
texts.en: Muzaffer is an experienced farmer living in a rural village called Nisiri Khusrav.  He is 43 years old, married and has children, of which there are seven.  Muzaffer rents 2.5 hectares of land on which he grows vine crops, cotton and wheat.  He has been farming for seven years.  His wife and one of his sons helps him with the business.  His oldest son is a migrant worker in a nearby country.  The rest of the children are in school.  Muzaffer must fertilize his crops to have a quality melon harvest.  He's asking for a loan to buy the fertilizer and fuel.  His future goals including buying land and expanding his business.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and fuel for his melon harvest

loans.name: Sakina

texts.en:
Sakina has successfully built her business of milk sales with the help of Kashf Foundation and Kiva loans. 

She has six buffaloes in milk and she sells good quality milk in her community. By this time she has retained a good number of customers and makes a good amount of income to contribute to the family income. 

In order to fulfill the increasing demands of her customers, she needs to purchase a cow in milk. For this she applied for her third loan in the amount of 35,000 PKR through Kashf Foundation. Sakina hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work.

loans.use: to purchase a cow in milk.

loans.name: Robeena

texts.en:
Robeena is a 44-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband at the corner of her house. She has five years of experience in this field.  Her husband assists her by purchasing her stock of goods from the market as he has maintained many contacts over the years. 

Robeena is a mother of six children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. She wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of PKR 50,000 to buy packs of salt, biscuits, rice, flour and beverages to meet the increasing demand at her store. She expects a boost in her earning and wishes to spend part of profits on the expansion of her business.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits, rice, flour and beverages.

loans.name: Massah

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 48-year-old Massah from Kandeh town Bo, Southern area in Freetown. She is married with seven children between the ages of 6 years and 28 years. Four of her children are attending school.   

Massah runs a cooked food business; she sells cooked rice, fried fish and cool drinks. She has been running this business for 20 years. She wakes up at 4:30 am to prepare her food business, and she will not rest until the food is finished. One of her daughters usually helps her to run the cooked food business. Her business is the only source of income she has. Massah describes her major hardship: sometimes to prepare the cooked food is very difficult.  

Massah has requested a loan in order to purchase cooking item including a bag of rice, coconut oil and soft drinks and Pure Water. The extra income from this loan will allow her to change the cooked food structure where she works and serves the food and educate her children. In the future, she plans to have her own residence. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to purchase cooking item including a bag of rice, coconut oil and soft drinks and Pure Water.

loans.name: Joveta

texts.en:
Joveta is 27 years old from the community of Talibon, Bohol. She is married with four children. Her eldest is 7 and her youngest is 2. For one year now, Joveta has operated a sari-sari (variety) store business for income. This help support the needs of her family.

She is asking for a loan to buy stocks of seasonings, canned goods, detergent, shampoo and body soap.

In the future, she hopes to expand her business and make a bigger store so she can continue to educate her children and support her family's future needs.

loans.use: to buy seasonings, canned goods, detergent, shampoo and body soap

loans.name: Safarmahmad

texts.ru: Сафармахмад житель района Гиссар. Ему 26 лет. Он женат и имеет двух маленьких детей - сына и дочку. Сафармахмад предприимчивый и деятельный человек. Он намерен начать торговый бизнес в сфере продуктов питания. Сафармахмад построил помещение для магазина. У него на руках осталось 3000 сомони (TJS). Теперь ему необходимо провести ремонт в магазине и закупить продукты питания. Ему не хватает еще немного денег и поэтому он обратился за кредитом. Сафармахмад добавив сумму кредита на сумму сбережения собирается сперва провести ремонт в магазине и затем приобрести товар. Он будет очень признателен за поддержку.
texts.en: Safarmahmad is a resident of Gissar, Tajikistan.  He is 26 ears old, married and has two small children, a son and a daughter.  He is an enterprising and energetic person.  He's set on starting his own business selling groceries.  Safarmahmad has built a building to be his store.  He has 3,000 TJS left.  Now he must put the finishing touches on the building and buy food goods.  He doesn't have quite enough money so he's asking for a loan.  Safarmahmad, combining his savings with the funds from the loan, will first finish the building and then buy his inventory.  He is grateful for the support.

loans.use: to make repairs to his store and buy food products to open a business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy movie discs and music discs and tapes for his music store.

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en: Parveen, age 43, is a married woman and a mother of three. She is a very talented lady and excels in her work of stitching. She has gotten a lot of appreciation from her community. She accepted the fact that if her husband alone works for their family, they will not be able to meet the expenses of their household or the educational needs of their children. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating a business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. She has now requested a loan of 25,000 PKR to purchase more reels of threads with packs of buttons, zippers and laces in various colors. In this way she will be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Parveen hopes to grow her business and dreams of providing quality education to her children through all her hard work.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of threads with packs of buttons, zippers and laces in various colors.

loans.name: Daryl

texts.en:
Daryl, 22 years old, is living harmoniously together with his parents at the village of Simanu Norte. According to his parents, Daryl is a very kind person; he makes sure that he can help them in the financial aspects of their life. 

Daryl is asking for a loan amounting to PHP 15,000 to buy fertilizer and seeds to grow for his farming business, to help his parents and earn more income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds to grow for his farm business.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is 40 years old and married to Rose, who helps him meet some of the family's financial needs through her poultry farming business. They are blessed with four children, ages 7 to 17. Joseph runs a brick making business in Kapsabet as well as small-scale dairy farm. He has been in these businesses for the last four years generating a monthly income of KES 14,000. He has borrowed 70000 KES which he will use to pay wages for workers that assist him in making bricks. He anticipates getting profits from the business which he will use the to pay his loan and his children's fees.

loans.use: To pay wages to workers in his brick-making business.

loans.name: Juana

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Juana works hard to support her family.

She has a fish-vending business in the Philippines and earns additional income from food vending. Juana is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell for her fish vending business.

Juana has been sustaining her business activities through her past  four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Fozia

texts.en: Fozia is 30 years old and a married woman with two children. She is striving hard to meet their demands including food, clothing, and health care. Her husband’s income is not sufficient to meet the daily expenses of the family. She started her business of stitching clothes to contribute in the family income. She is familiar with stitching techniques and enjoys a great client list. She requested a loan of 30,000 PKR to buy a stock of threads in different colors with packs of buttons, needles and elastics. Then she would be able to meet the demands of her customers without fail. She hopes to grow her business and dreams of providing a quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to buy a stock of threads in different colors with packs of buttons, needles and elastics.

loans.name: Summra

texts.en:
Summra is a 39-year-old married woman. She has been running a business of animal sales and purchase for the past five years. She buys animals (baby goats and baby cows) at low prices, brings them up, and then her husband sells them in the market at higher prices. 

She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation; currently, she requested a loan of Rs. 20,000 to purchase two more goats. She is in her fifth loan cycle with a good repayment history. 

Summra hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase two more goats.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.pt:
É oficialmente solteiro, mas vive maritalmente em casa própria, tem 54 anos de idade, natural de Moamba e pai de 12 filhos, 7 dos quais maiores de idade, 3 já trabalham e 4 já com seus lares e os restantes ainda na sua responsabilidade. Vive de negócio há longos anos, tem 2 estabelecimentos comerciais, 1 em sua casa e outro numa zona em expansão. Com o empréstimo vai comprar produtos alimentares como arroz, farinha, açúcar, óleo, fósforos, refrescos, cervejas e vinhos para reforçar o seu negócio.
Para além do negócio, ele tem uma carrinha com a qual fornece água à população vizinha. Ele tem esperança de fazer subir o seu negócio, melhorar suas condições de vida e aumentar o número de cabeças de gado que ele tem a criar. Ele tem várias despesas pelo facto de ter muitos filhos, razão pela qual na idade que está ainda não conseguiu alcançar os seus objectivos, o que ele considera ser seu maior desafio.
texts.en:
Antonio is officially single, but he's in a common law marriage. He lives in a house that he owns. He's 54 years old and comes from Moamba. He has 12 children, 7 of whom are adults - 3 of them are in the workforce and 4 of them already have their own homes. The rest of the children are still under his responsibility. He has been a businessman for several years. He owns two stores, one located in his house and another one in a currently expanding area. With the loan he'll purchase foodstuffs such as rice, flour, sugar, cooking oil, matches, refreshments, beer and wine in order to bolster his business.
Aside from his business, he owns a van with which he provides water for the neighboring population. He hopes to upgrade his business, improve his living conditions and expand the cattle herd he raises. Because he has many children, he has a lot of expenses, which is why at his age he still hasn't accomplished his goals, which he considers to be his biggest challenge.

loans.use: to purchase foodstuffs such as rice, flour, sugar, cooking oil, matches, refreshments, beer and wine in order to bolster his business.

loans.name: Caterine

texts.es: Caterine es una joven de 23 años, ella es una mujer que con su trabajo diario logra salir adelante con mucho esfuerzo, solicito un crédito por $1.000.000 para comprar insumos para su negocio de comida (carne, mazorca, arepas) ella trabaja en los parques públicos o en eventos que se realicen en la ciudad, para ella esta es su fuente de ingresos y con esto espera avanzar cada día más logrando que su negocio crezca para luego heredarlo a sus descendientes.
texts.en: Caterine is a young 23-year-old. Through her daily hard work, she is able to get ahead. She is requesting a loan of 1,000,000 [COP] for the purchase of supplies for her food business (meat, corn, and arepas). She sells in the public parks or at events in the city. This is her source of income, and she hopes to improve every day. She hopes that her business will grow so that she can leave it as an inheritance for her descendants.

loans.use: to buy meat, corn, and arepas.

loans.name: María Fernanda

texts.es: Fernanda, a sus 34 años de edad vive en unión libre con su pareja y no tiene hijos. Toda su vida la ha pasado en el campo, donde su padre le enseñó las labores agropecuarias; por lo que actualmente se dedica a la producción y venta de leche, en un pequeño lote que le presta su padre y por ser hija única su padre le dejará como herencia el ganado y el terreno que tiene, el día que fallezca. Fernanda es una mujer luchadora, trabajadora, activa y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, por esa razón solicita el crédito, con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de una vaca productora de leche, de esta manera aumentará su producción y por lo tanto tendrá más ingresos por la venta del líquido. Esto le ayudará a mejorar su calidad de vida y podrá cumplir el sueño de ampliar su negocio para que sea perdurable en el tiempo.
texts.en:
Fernanda, age 34, is in a common-law marriage and has no children. She has spent her whole life in the country, where her father taught her to work in agriculture. She now produces and sells milk on her small plot of land which her father has lent her. Because she is an only child, her father will leave her his livestock and land when he passes away. 
Fernanda is a hard-working woman who is very active and has a great desire to succeed. For this reason, she is requesting a loan. She will invest it in the purchase of a dairy cow. This will increase her production, so she will have a greater income. This will help her to improve her quality of life, and she will be able to reach her dream of expanding her business so that it lasts a long time.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Assia

texts.pt:
É viúva há 4 anos, tem 34 anos de idade e vive na casa própria com os seus 2 filhos menores, um na oitava classe e outro na sexta. Assia tem nível médio e actualmente está a frequentar o ensino superior à distância. 
Ela trabalha como assistente técnica na secretaria da escola secundária. Com o valor de empréstimo ela pretende investir na compra de cimento, varão de ferro e chapas de zinco para dar continuidade à construção de sua casa que iniciou há 3 anos.
Ássia tem a esperança de aumentar o seu nível de escolaridade e melhorar a sua carreira profissional, terminar a construção de sua casa e garantir um futuro melhor para os seus filhos. O seu maior desafio está nos seus rendimentos que são muito baixos para suportar as várias despesas que tem.
texts.en:
Assia was widowed four years ago. She's 34 years old and lives with her two underage children in a house that she owns. One of her children is in 8th grade and the other one is in 6th grade. Assia graduated high school and she's currently attending college through distance learning.
She works as an administrative assistant for a high school office. With the amount from the loan she intends to purchase cement, iron rods and metal sheets in order to continue building her house, which she started three years ago.
Assia hopes to raise her level of schooling and make improvements in her career. She also hopes to finish building her house and ensure a better future for her children. Her biggest challenge is the fact that her income is very low for covering the many expenses she has.

loans.use: to purchase cement, iron rods and metal sheets in order to continue building her house.

loans.name: Javier Antonio

texts.es:
Javier, una persona joven de 20 años de edad, llena de muchos sueños, se ha crecido en una familia emprendedora. Ahora Javier es padre de familia de una niña de 6 meses, vive con su compañera de vida en la comunidad.
sus padres le enseñaron los trabajos de la agricultura, la albañilería y las artesanías (hamacas de seda y poliseda) su padre le enseño a trabajar desde los 10 años de edad, oficio que ahora él lo realiza con presición, todos sus hermanos también realizan el arte de las hamacas.

Él estudio en el pueblo, donde vive hasta el nivel básico, ahora ya cuenta con su propia familia a quienes darles el sustento diario. Hace hamacas de seda y de poliseda, conoce del negocio y le es rentable, las vende en dos ciudades del país y en la comunidad, los días domingos y sábados o según los clientes se lo soliciten. Elabora de 12 a 14  hamacas en el mes.

Actualmente, trabaja con su padre en el cultivo de maíz también,  a sembrado 7,000 metros cuadrados en la comunidad.


Javier compra los materiales (hilo, poliducto, guardacabos y gorros) para la hechura de las hamacas, en la ciudad mas cercana, el cual tiene que viajar por una hora en bus hasta llegar al destino cada ocho días o dependiendo de los encargos (pedidos) que en ocasiones le hacen.

 Solicita un crédito a la fundación Campo para la compra de tres cajas de hilo de seda, guardacabos 40 pares, poliducto,  tres docenas de gorro para la elaboración de las hamacas, el resto lo invertirá en la  agricultura, pues trabaja junto con el padre en los cultivos.

Con el financiamiento, dispondra de los insumos para seguir elaborando hamacas, y aumentar su producción, pues le hacen pedidos en ocasiones y hay que cumplir en los tiempos. Ademas contara con una mayor oferta para los clientes.
A la vez,  mejorara su calidad de vida pues se asegura la alimentación con la producción del maíz, y a la vez obtendra ingresos económicos con las ventas de las hamacas, que le permitirán darle el alimento a su esposa y a su hija.
 sueña crecer poco a poco en las ventas de las hamacas, ademas planea crear en el futuro un negocio ya establecido donde puedan ir a comprar los clientes, también planea construir su  casa para su familia.
texts.en:
Javier, a young man of twenty, full of many dreams, has grown up in a family of entrepreneurs.  He is now the father of a six-month-old girl.  He lives with his daughter and his common-law wife.

His parents taught him the businesses of farming, bricklaying and crafts (hammocks made of natural or artificial silk.)  His father taught him to make hammocks from the age of ten, and now he is very skilled.  All of his brothers also do this type of work.

He went to school in his village and obtained a basic education.  He currently provides a living for his own family.  His hammock business is profitable.  He sells his goods in his local community and in two other cities on Saturdays and Sundays, and also makes them at the request of customers.  He makes 12-14 hammocks each month.

Currently, he also works with his father growing corn.  They are raising 7,000 square meters of this crop in their area.

Javier buys his materials (thread, tubing, thimbles and caps) in the closest city.  He has to travel by bus for one hour to get there.  He goes every eight days, and on other occasions, depending on what orders he has to fill.

He is seeking a loan from Fundación Campo to purchase three boxes of silk thread, 40 pairs of thimbles, three dozen caps and plastic tubing for making hammocks.  He will invest the remainder in agriculture, since he also works alongside his father growing crops.

With the proceeds, he will obtain the supplies he needs so he can continue making hammocks and increase his production.  He has orders and at times needs to fill them on a deadline.  This will also allow him to offer more products to his customers.

At the same time, he will be able to improve his quality of life.  His corn crops will ensure that he can feed his family.  At the same time he will make more income from the sale of his hammocks, which will enable him to provide sustenance to his wife and daughter.

His dream is to grow his sales little by little.  He also wants to create a permanent location for his business where his customers can come to shop.  In addition, he plans to build a house for his family.

loans.use: to purchase three boxes of silk thread, 40 pairs of thimbles, three dozen caps and plastic tubing for making hammocks.  He will invest the remainder in agriculture, since he also works alongside his father growing crops.

loans.name: Ángela María

texts.es: Ángela, a sus 32 años de edad es madre de 2 hijos y vive en unión libre con su pareja. Nació y creció en el campo, donde sus padres y hermanos mayores le enseñaron las labores agropecuarias, pues es una tradición familiar. Actualmente, tiene un galpón de pollos, donde los cría y engorda para luego venderlos y así generar ingresos para el sostenimiento de sus hijos; pero desea iniciar con la actividad ganadera, para aprovechar una parcela con pasto de su propiedad, por esa razón y con su actitud emprendedora, solicita el crédito con el fin de comprar ganado (6 terneras de levante), que a mediano plazo le generarán más ingresos y recursos para brindarle a su familia una estabilidad económica favorable y una excelente educación a sus hijos para que sean personas íntegras y tengan un futuro próspero y exitoso. Su familia es el motor que mueve a Ángela y, es por ellos que lucha día a día para avanzar hacia el cumplimiento de sus objetivos y metas, especialmente, progresar con la actividad ganadera y que sea lograr que sea perdurable en el tiempo, así tendrá una mejor calidad de vida y mejor bienestar.
texts.en: Ángela, age 32, is a mother of two and in a common-law marriage. She was born and raised in the country, where her parents and older siblings taught her how to work in agriculture; it is a family tradition. She currently has a henhouse where she raises and fattens chickens to later sell. This generates an income so she can support her children, but she wants to start working with livestock in order to make use of a pasture she owns. This is why, with an enterprising attitude, she is requesting a loan. She will use it to buy livestock (6 calves). In some time they will generate more income so that she can provide her family solid economic stability and give her children an excellent education. This will ensure that they become upright people with a prosperous and successful future. Her family is her motor; she fights for them every day. She works hard to move forward and meet her goals. She wants to move forward with the livestock business and make it a solid business. This will allow her to have a better quality of life and better well-being.

loans.use: to buy six calves to raise.

loans.name: Cacilda

texts.pt:
Tem 43 anos de idade, é solteira e tem 1 filho de 28 anos de idade. Estudou até à 10ª classe e trabalha como auxiliar administrativa num tribunal. 
Com este crédito ela pretende comprar cimento, varões de ferro, barrotes, areia e um carrinho de mão para dar continuidade à construção de sua casa iniciada este ano. Ela tem esperança de concluir a construção de sua casa e conseguir mobilá-la. Tem como grande desafio as dificuldades financeiras e o elevado custo de vida e do material de construção pois o seu rendimento é bastante baixo.
texts.en:
Cacilda is 43 years old and single. She has a 28-year-old son. She completed 10th grade and works as an administrative clerk for a court.
With this loan she intends to purchase cement, iron rods, beams and a wheelbarrow in order to continue building her house, which she started this year. She hopes to finish building her house and furnish it. Her big challenge is the financial hardships as well as the high cost of living and construction supplies, since her income is very low.

loans.use: to purchase cement, iron rods, beams, sand and a wheelbarrow in order to continue building her house.

loans.name: Celso

texts.es:
El señor Celso tiene 38 años y está Casado con la señora Tereza quien tiene 34 años, la pareja tiene una hija de 7 años, el motivo de lucha de ambos y por quien se esfuerzan para sacarla adelante.
El señor Celso tiene su propio taller mecánico y su gomería en su casa, comenta también que tiene muy buena clientela que siempre acude hasta su taller por el buen servicio que siempre les da. Es una persona muy trabajadora que sale adelante con sacrificio.
Solicita el crédito para el mantenimiento de su camión de carga para realizar Fletes de caña de azúcar a la azucarera de Arroyo y Estero y de esa forma poder generar un ingreso extra para ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Celso is 38 years old and is married to Tereza, who is 34.  The couple has a 7-year-old daughter.  She is the reason for all of their efforts; they fight to provide her with a better life.

He has his own auto and tire repair shop in his home.  He reports that he has a good base of customers who always come to his shop because of the good service he consistently provides.  He is a hardworking person who is getting ahead through his sacrifice.

He is seeking a loan so that he can perform maintenance on his cargo truck.  This will allow him to make deliveries of sugar to the refineries in the district of Arroyo y Estero.  This will enable him to generate extra income so he can help his family.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on his cargo truck.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clay pots, baskets, manure, and fertilizer, and to make repairs to the greenhouse.

loans.name: Yasmeen

texts.en:
Yasmeen is a 52-year-old widow. She is a vigorous lady, and for the past 12 years, she has been running a clothing business. Yasmeen buys embroidered and printed clothes, of different fabrics and in various colors and designs. She buys them from the market at wholesale rates, and then sells them to the people of her community at retail. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business.

Yasmeen is requesting a 25,000 PKR loan from the Kashf Foundation. She will use the loan to buy a wide variety of clothes, in various colors and designs, to expand her inventory and attract more customers. Yasmeen expects a boost in her earnings with this loan, and she plans to spend part of her profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of clothes, in various colors and designs, in order to attract more customers

loans.name: Celeste

texts.pt:
CELESTE tem 43 anos de idade, apenas estudou até ao nível primário, é separada e mãe de 3 filhos com 7, 11 e 19 anos respectivamente, todos ainda estudantes. Vive de negócio já há muitos anos mesmo antes da sua separação do pai dos filhos.
Celeste tem um estabelecimento comercial no seu quintal, no qual vende vários produtos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar arroz, açúcar, óleo de cozinha, farinha e bebidas, entre outros. O seu estabelecimento abre todos os dias das 7:00h até as 21:00h. Tem dois empregados e os filhos também ajudam na gestão do negócio. Além do estabelecimento comercial é criadora do gado bovino.
Constitui seu sonho fortificar cada vez mais o seu negócio a fim de comprar uma viatura para uso familiar, uma vez que as condições habitacionais estão melhoradas. Ela diz ser uma mulher realizada ou satisfeita ao nível económico.
texts.en:
Celeste is 43 years old. She only completed elementary school. She's separated and has three children aged 7, 11 and 19 years respectively, all of whom are still in school. She has been a businesswoman for several years, even before she separated from the father of her children.
Celeste runs a store from her yard where she sells various products. With this loan she intends to purchase rice, sugar, cooking oil, flour and beverages, among other items. Her store opens everyday from 7 a.m. to 9 p.m.. She has two employees, and her children also help her to manage the business. Aside from her store, she raises cattle.
Her dream is to increasingly bolster her business so she can buy a vehicle for her family to use, once their living conditions have improved. She states that she's an accomplished and content woman in terms of her finances.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, cooking oil and beverages for re-selling.

loans.name: Marie

texts.en:
Meet 47-year-old Marie, from Kandeh town, Bo, Sierra Leone. She is married and has four children. Two of her children are going to school.  In 2012, Marie established her palm oil business. She began her business because she needs to generate income to take care of herself and her family. She works at the business every day, from morning to night.  She says that the main challenges to her business are price inflation and transportation.

Marie requires a loan in order to purchase palm oil, gari (a staple food made from cassava) and general stock, to offer for sale. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to both grow her business and repay her loan. In the future, Marie plans to see her business to a higher level. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase palm oil, gari and general stock, to offer for sale

loans.name: Felizmina

texts.pt:
Felizmina tem 52 anos de idade, é solteira e mãe de uma filha que frequenta o nível superior. Vive na casa de serviço e é docente há mais de 10 anos, trabalhando 8 horas diárias. Felizmina sustenta  também os seus pais.
Ela tem uma casa em construção e com o dinheiro do empréstimo vai comprar varões, um lava-loiça e cimento para dar continuidade à construção da sua casa. No futuro pretende fazer criação de gado bovino, e fazer um mestrado. Vai fazer poupanças e gerir criteriosamente o salário para poder lograr seus planos.
texts.en:
Felizmina is 52 years old and single. She has a daughter who attends college. She lives in company housing and has been a teacher for over 10 years. She works 8 hours a day. Felizmina also supports her parents.
She owns a house that's under construction. With the money from the loan she'll purchase rods, a kitchen sink and cement in order to continue building her house. In the future she intends to raise cattle and get a master's degree. She'll save money and manage her salary very carefully so she can achieve her plans.

loans.use: to purchase rods, a kitchen sink and cement in order to continue building her house.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria es alumna regular del 4to año de la carrera Gestión Pública. Actualmente se dedica a trabajar como macatera, es decir como vendedora ambulante. Su principal anhelo es recibirse y trabajar en una institución pública o privada para poder ayudar a sus padres en la manutención del hogar.
Ella solicita de este crédito para poder pagar sus clases y también de las cuotas de la universidad, para que así siga trabajando y mejorando su vida.
texts.en:
Gloria is a regular 4th year student of Public Management. Right now, she is working as a macatera, that is a street vendor. Her main wish is to graduate and work in a public or private institution so she can help her parents support the home.

She is asking for this loan to be able to pay for her classes and also pay for tuition and keep working and improving her life.

loans.use: to pay for her university classes and pay for tuition.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 51 years old and married. She has three children. She works hard to provide for her family, running a general store in the Philippines. She has been running the general store for 25 years, and she earns additional income from prepared food vending, raising pigs and gasoline retailing.

She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the loan to purchase additional stock to sell at her general store, like coffee, soft drinks, snack foods, noodles, candies and other groceries. She has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF, before this loan. Lolita aspires to build and expand her business, to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell at her general store, like coffee, noodles, candies and other groceries

loans.name: Olga Julieta

texts.es: Julieta a sus 48 años de edad, debido a la falta de oportunidades de empleo y por necesidad se motivó a independizarse y conseguir ingresos por su cuenta, por eso desea iniciar un negocio de comidas rápidas que estará ubicado en una esquina muy transitada del barrio donde reside. Ella desea ofrecer en su negocio arepas de queso, patacones de plátano, chorizos con arepa, butifarras, arepas de chocolo, gaseosas entre otros, con esto espera conseguir los recursos necesarios para satisfacer sus necesidades básicas. Julieta es una señora trabajadora, pujante, emprendedora, solicita el crédito como apoyo para invertirlo en la compra de activos fijos (sillas, carpa) e insumos para elaborar los alimentos (carnes frías, aceite, arepas, plátanos, gaseosas) para tener disponibilidad y variedad de productos que satisfagan los gustos de todos sus clientes, de esta forma podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar.
texts.en: Julieta is 48 years old. Due to a lack of job opportunities and out of necessity, she was motivated to go off on her own and obtain income herself. That is why she decided to start a fast food business that will be located on a very busy corner in the neighborhood where she lives. She wants to offer cheese arepas in her business, plantain patacones, chorizo with arepas,  butifarras, corn arepas,  sodas and more. With this, she hopes to obtain the income she needs to pay for her basic expenses. Julieta is a hardworking, striving, enterprising  woman, She is asking for the loan as help to invest in buying fixed assets (chairs, a tent) and materials to prepare the food (deli meats, oil, arepas, plantains, and soda) to have a variety of products available to satisfy all of her customers' tastes. This way, she will be able to have a better quality of life and wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy fixed assets (chairs, a tent) and materials to prepare food (deli meats, oil, arepas, plantains, sodas).

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie, from Maloro, Tangub City, is 50 years old and married. To make a living, Elsie owns and operates a business serving a variety of meals to customers in the local community. She has been engaged in her enterprise for more than five years and earns approximately 5,000 PHP a month.

In 2011, Elsie joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She is now requesting a new loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase pots and help expand her facility. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase pots and expand her facility

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es:
Sergio es alumno regular del 6to año de la carrera Derecho. Actualmente está trabajando como secretario de un estudio Jurídico. Su objetivo es llegar a recibirse  como Abogado y luego trabajar en la profesión.
Es una persona que quiere salir adelante y se está esforzando por conseguirlo, tiene muchas metas y sueños por lo que está luchando.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas y clases de la facultad, y de esa forma estar cada vez más cerca de su objetivo.
texts.en: Sergio is a regular student in the 6th year of Law.  He’s currently employed as a secretary in a law office.  His objective is to become a lawyer and then work in his profession.  He’s a person who wants to get ahead and is striving to do so; he has many goals and dreams he’s striving to meet.  He requests this loan to pay his university tuition and fees so that he can get closer to his objective each time.

loans.use: to pay university tuition and fees.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
Marina es de la ciudad de Paraguarí, ella comenta que con el estudio que está realizando pretende llegar a muchos sueños, pero la meta principal en estos momentos es culminar la facultad y el día de mañana poder servir a las personas y ayudar económicamente a sus padres.
Ella es una joven luchadora que quiere ser una buena profesional que pueda ayudar a las demás personas.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en pagar sus clases y también las cuotas de su universidad, que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Marina’s from the city of Paraguarí.  She comments that she intends to reach many dreams by means of her studies but her main goal at the moment is to graduate in her major so that in future she can serve people and help her parents economically.

She’s a hardworking young woman who wants to be a good professional that can be of service to others.  She requests this loan to pay her university tuition and fees; it will be of great help to her.

loans.use: to pay university tuition and fees.

loans.name: Oscar De Jesús

texts.es: Oscar con 39 años de edad, es un hombre soltero y no tiene hijos. Nació y creció en el campo, donde su padre le enseñó todas las labores agropecuarias, con las cuales han obtenido ingresos generación tras generación por ser una tradición familiar. Desde hace 15 años, él se dedica a la producción de leche, pues cuenta con varias cabezas de ganado lechero y el producto que saca es vendido a una de las empresas lecheras más grandes a nivel nacional; de esta manera, Oscar adquiere los recursos para el sustento diario de su hogar y para el cuidado de sus animales. El titular es un hombre luchador, que con esfuerzo y dedicación ha sobrepasado los obstáculos que se le presentan debido al bajo precio de venta del líquido que produce, por eso se motiva para solicitar el crédito, con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de 2 vacas productoras de leche, con el fin de aumentar su producción diaria y así tener más disponibilidad del líquido para la venta, incrementando de esta forma sus ingresos para sobrevivir, además el apoyo del crédito permitirá un avance hacia el cumplimiento de sus principal sueño, que es hacer de su actividad, un negocio solvente, rentable y que le permita tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Oscar, age 39, is a single man with no children. He was born and raised in the country, where his father taught him to work in agriculture. Generations of his family have made their living this way; it is a family tradition. For fifteen years he has been a dairy farmer. He has several heads of milk-producing cattle, and he sells milk to the largest dairy companies on the national level. This is how he makes an income to support his household and to care for his animals.
He is a hard-working man who has overcome his obstacles through hard work and dedication, despite the low sales price for milk. This has motivated him to request a loan for the purchase of two dairy cows. His goal is to increase his daily production and to have more milk to sell. This will increase his income so he can continue on. This loan will also allow him to move toward reaching his main goal, which is to make his business a solvent, profitable venture that will allow him to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows.

loans.name: Daicy

texts.es:
Daisy actualmente es administradora de una empresa familiar, y su meta futura es enseñar en una facultad y de aquí a un tiempo ser una profesional competente.
Está trabajando y estudiando ya que esa es la única forma de ir creciendo y logrando las metas que cada uno se propone.
Hoy solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en pagar sus clases, también materiales de estudios y cuotas. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Daisy is currently the administrator of a family company. Her goal for the future is to teach in a university, and to be a competent professional.
She is working and studying, since this is the only way one can grow and reach one's goals.
She is requesting this loan today so that she can invest in paying for her classes and class materials. She is grateful for this opportunity, as it will be a great help for her.

loans.use: to pay for university classes.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es:
Silvia es alumna regular del 2do año de carrera Profesorado en Informática. Actualmente está trabajando como limpiadora, dice que es un trabajo muy sacrificado y que lo hace por poder salir adelante y el día de mañana ser una buena profesional.
Ella solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en pagar las cuotas de su universidad, y de esa forma poder seguir estudiando y estar muy cerca de cumplir su sueño. Esta contento por esta oportunidad de progreso y de estudio que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
Silvia is a regular student in her second year of computer science. She is currently working as a cleaner, and says that it is a very demanding job and that she does it so that she can get ahead and become a professional one day.
She is requesting this loan to invest in the payment of her university tuition. This will allow her to continue to study and to be very near to her dream. She is happy to have this opportunity to progress and study.

loans.use: to pay university tuition.

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es:
Rocio es de la ciudad de Carapeguá, es una estudiante de la carrera de derecho, está estudiando y trabajando, ya que esa es la única forma de poder estar cada vez más cerca de su meta. Ella es muy emprendedora y tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.
Quiere ser una gran profesional que sea útil, no solo a si mismo, sino también a los demás, y es por eso que se está esforzando al máximo.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en sus clases de la universidad, también para sus libros y demás gastos. Agradece por esta oportunidad que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
Rocio is from the city of Carapeguá. She is a law student who's attending classes and also working, since that is the only way for her to be increasingly closer to her goal. She is very entrepreneurial and has a great desire to move forward.

She wants to be a great and valuable professional, not only for herself, but also for others; this is why she's giving it her utmost effort. She's applying for this loan to invest in her university classes, textbooks, and other expenses. She is grateful for the opportunity that she's receiving.

loans.use: to pay for her classes, textbooks, and other expenses.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
Jose tiene 19 años, es soltero, vive en la Ciudad de Villarrica, se dedica a la fabricación casera de ladrillos y su cocción. Esta actividad la aprendió de su padre, ya que todos en esa zona se dedican a esa actividad.
Jose es un joven que está esforzándose por salir adelante y luchar para poder ayudar a su familia, hoy solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en los ladrillos que fabrica y que le será de mucha ayuda. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo que será de mucha ayuda para él.
texts.en:
José, 19, is single living in the city of Villarrica.  He works making and baking home-made bricks.  He learned this activity from his father since everyone in this zone is in this line of work.

José is a young man who is making the effort to get ahead and to strive to be able to help his family.  Today, he’s requesting this loan to be able to invest in the bricks he makes which will be of great help to him.  He’s grateful for this opportunity he’s getting that will be of much help to him.

loans.use: to buy brick-making supplies.

loans.name: Las Chacareras Group

texts.es:
Las integrantes de este grupo son del barrio Chacarita es una zona muy olvidada; muchas personas residen ahí, se esta buscando motivarlas a trabajar y como mecanismo se está utilizando la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, para poder ayudarlas a que vayan mejorando su situación de pobreza.
Una de estas mujeres es Dominga, quien hace pedicura y manicure, por medio de este honrado esfuerzo está luchando para ganarse el sustento y el de su familia. Es una persona muy trabajadora, quien solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de esmaltes, acetonas, algodón, alicates y demás para seguir trabajando y dando un buen servicio a sus clientes. Esta agradecida por esta oportunidad que esta recibiendo,que le permitirá ir mejorando sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The members of this group are from the Chacarita neighborhood, a much neglected zone.  Many people live there and ways to motivate them to work are being sought and as a mechanism to do so the poverty elimination survey is being used to help them gradually improve their poverty situation.

One of these women is Dominga who does pedicures and manicures and by means of this honest effort is striving to earn her and her family’s sustenance.  She’s a very hardworking person who requests this loan to be able to invest in the purchase of nail polish, acetone, cotton, nail clippers and others to continue working and providing good customer service.  She’s grateful for this opportunity that she’s getting that will make it possible for her to improve her income.

loans.use: to buy nail polish, acetone, cotton, nail clippers, etc.

loans.name: Elham

texts.en:
Elham is a 51-year-old married mother of two. She has been working in her convenience store since seven years ago to help her beloved husband in making their living and developing their socioeconomic situation.

Elham sells tinned food, fruits, vegetables, sweets and beverages. She is also specialized in preparing cooked food and selling a daily dish that attracts a lot of employed single men who live alone and request a healthy food.

Elham is applying for a loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua, to increase her merchandise with special offer products. She hopes to develop her business and start a catering service company in the future.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with special offer products.

loans.name: Peguaho Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado el Peguaho está en su ciclo número 4to del programa de comité, ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde gracias al esfuerzo que cada una hace están mejorando sus ingresos y superándose cada día mas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Lourdes, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel dos, es decir con ingresos medios, ella  través del esfuerzo y dedicación continua se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza. Ella se dedica a las ventas ya que tiene una despensa bien surtida, y solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos para su despensa, como ser verduras, frutas, carne y demás, que le ayudará a seguir mejorando su atención a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The group called "El Peguaho" is in its 4th funding cycle of the committee program.  They are participating in a survey for the elimination of poverty, which thanks to the efforts of each one of them is improving their incomes and helping them get ahead each day.

One of the group members is Lourdes. In the last survey she was identified as being at the second level of poverty, that is to say with mid-level poverty. Through her hard work and dedication she continues to improve her economic situation. She works in sales and has a well supplied store. She is asking for a loan in order to invest in the purchase of foods for her store such as vegetables, fruits, meat and other items. This will help her provide better service to her customers.

loans.use: To purchase vegetables, fruits, meat and other items.

loans.name: Blanca Oliva

texts.es: Blanca es una mujer que tiene 2 hijos, ella inicio su negocio para sacar adelante a su familia, trabaja todos los días vendiendo comidas y solicito el préstamo de $ 1.000.000 para comprar insumos de inventario y así ofrecer mayor variedad de productos generando más ganancias y poder transformar su negocio en un gran restaurante.
texts.en:
Blanca is a woman with two children.  She started her business to get her family ahead.  She works every day selling food.

She requested the loan for 1,000,000 pesos [COP] to buy supplies for inventory.  This way she can offer a greater variety of products, generate more profits, and transform her business into a great restaurant.

loans.use: to buy supplies

loans.name: Antonio

texts.pt:
António é guarda fronteira e estudante de nível superior. Trabalha em turnos, tem 33 anos de idade, tem três filhos dos quais dois estão frequentando nível primário e um ainda é bebé. Vive na casa própria que está ainda em construção.
O dinheiro do empréstimo será aplicado na compra de tubos, torneiras e válvulas para canalização de água na sua casa e pagamento de propinas na sua faculdade. No futuro pretende terminar a construção da sua casa, e oficializar o casamento, para tal vai trabalhar mais e economizar o salário.
texts.en:
António is a border guard and a college student. He works by shifts. He's 33 years old and has three children, two of whom are in elementary school and the other one is still a baby. He lives in a house that he owns which is still under construction.
The money from the loan will be used to purchase pipes, faucets and valves for the water piping in his house. He'll also pay for his college tuition fees. In the future he intends to finish building his house and make his marriage official, and for that purpose he'll work harder and save his salary.

loans.use: to pay for his college tuition fees and also to purchase pipes, faucets and valves for the water piping in his house.

loans.name: Razia

texts.en:
Razia is a 45-year-old married woman. She has been in the business of manufacturing paint brushes for many years. She lives in a small house in Faisalabad and sells her brushes in the local market. She started her own business to help her husband financially, as his income was barely enough to meet the growing needs of the family. 

Initially, her sales were low and retailers were reluctant to keep her brushes in their store. But over time, with hard work and dedication, Razia mastered the art of brush-making. She is currently in her fourth loan cycle. 

Due to increasing demand for paint brushes, Razia applied for another loan in the amount of 40,000 PKR through Kashf Foundation. She intends to purchase a large quantity of raw material, such as filaments and wooden and plastic handles. This will enable her to increase her supply to more cities and to gain more profits.

loans.use: to purchase a large quantity of raw material such as filaments and wooden and plastic handles.

loans.name: Dorcus

texts.en:
Dorcus is a lady of fifty-three years, married to Kamau, and a mother of four children who are all adults. She lives with four children whom she supports fully. 

Dorcus rears and sells chickens in Kawangware. She has been in this business for twenty-two years and gets a monthly income of fifteen thousand shillings.

This will be Dorcus' third loan with KADET LTD. She plans to use the entire loan to buy one-day-old chicks and chicken feed. 

In the future, she wants to improve her living standards.

loans.use: to purchase chicks and chicken feed.

loans.name: Mujeres Activas Group

texts.es:
Las 15 integrantes son mujeres muy activas, es por eso que el grupo lleva ese nombre, ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza y 10 de ellas se encuentran con ingresos muy bajos, luchando cada una por poder superarlo.
Nilda, es integrante del grupo, es una mujer muy dedicada, también es la presidenta del grupo, siempre motiva a sus compañeras a seguir luchando y esforzándose por mejorar. Ella es macatera (vendedora ambulante) de productos de todo tipo, y por medio de su trabajo está saliendo adelante.
Ella solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de sabanas, frazadas, toallas, ropas para invierno, zapatos etc. Y de esa forma poder surtirse y seguir con sus ventas.
texts.en:
The 15 members of this group are very active women; this is why the group has this name ["Active Women"]. They are doing a survey on the elimination of poverty, and ten of them have very low incomes and fight every day to overcome this.
Nilda is a member of this group. She is a very dedicated woman. She is also the group president. She always motivates her peers to keep fighting and working hard to improve. She is a street vendor, and sells all kinds of products. Through her work, she is getting ahead.
She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of sheets, blankets, winter clothing, shoes, etc. This will allow her to stock her business and continue with her sales.

loans.use: to buy sheets, blankets, towels, winter clothing, shoes, etc.

loans.name: Tesapeara Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Tesapeara; está en su ciclo número  4  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante.  Es un grupo que esta uniéndose cada vez más,  y se están ayudando siempre las unas a las otras.
Una persona muy entusiasta y trabajadora es la Sra. Natividad, quien se dedica a la venta de golosinas de todo tipo, ella es muy sacrificada, y una persona muy humilde, que pese a todo siempre está luchando por ir mejorando, ya que sabe que la única forma de salir adelante es trabajando.
Ella solicita de este crédito para comprar golosinas como galletitas, caramelo, chupetines y demás. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe que le será de ayuda.
texts.en: The group called "Tesapeara" is in its 4th loan cycle with the Committee for Women. They all work and help each other to get ahead, and the group is getting strong and more unified with each cycle.  One very hard-working and enthusiastic person is Natividad.  She works selling sweets of all kinds.  She is very self-sacrificing and a very humble person who despite everything is always struggling to improve.  She knows that work is the only way to get ahead.  She is asking for a loan in order to buy sweets like cookies, caramels, suckers, and other items. She is thankful for this opportunity as it will be of great help.

loans.use: To buy cookies, caramels, suckers and other items.

loans.name: San Miguel El Triunfo Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Comité San Miguel El Triunfo está en su ciclo número 1, nueve de ellas están con ingresos muy escasos, y por debajo del mínimo mensual, esto es posible saber por medio del programa de eliminación de pobreza, donde hacen la encuesta de eliminación, estas mujeres están confiadas de que podrán ir mejorando por medio de las capacitaciones y el trabajo en conjunto de todas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Rosalba, quien se dedica a la venta ambulante de chipas (alimento típico paraguayo). Es por medio de este trabajo que viene ayudando a su familia, luchando día a día y sacrificándose por ellos. Quiere mejorar su nivel de pobreza, y es por eso que se esfuerza más.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de chipa, ya que este es su principal objeto de venta y quiere poder seguir trabajando. Agradece por esta ayuda que recibe, que es muy importante para ella.
texts.en:
The group called "San Miguel El Triunfo" Committee is in its first loan cycle. There are nine group members who have very limited income and who earn below the minimum wage each month.  This information comes through the Program for the Elimination of Poverty, which completed a survey with these women, who are confident that they can improve their level of training and income together as a group. 

One of the group members is Rosalba. She works as a walking vendor selling "chipas," a traditional Paraguayan food. Rosalba helps her family through this work, struggling each day and sacrificing for them. She wants to improve her economic level and move out of poverty, and for that reason she is working so hard. She is asking for this loan in order to purchase "chipa," since this is what she mainly sells and she wants to continue working.  She is thankful for the assistance she has received, which is very important for her.

loans.use: To purchase "chipa," a traditional Paraguayan food.

loans.name: Arnaldo

texts.pt:
O Sr. Arnaldo de 54 anos de idade, é casado e tem 4 filhos dos quais 2 estão a frequentar escola no ensino secundário e os 2 são independentes. Ele è operário agrícola numa empresa de produção de banana.
O presente empréstimo será aplicado na compra de material de construção (cimento, blocos, chapas, janelas, portas, aros e pagamento de mão-de-obra) para dar continuidade a sua casa.
O Sr. Arnaldo tem como esperança terminar a sua casa e adquirir mais fundos na Hluvuku-Adsema.
texts.en:
Arnaldo is 54 years old and married. He has four children, two of whom attend high school and the other two are independent. He's a farm worker for a banana company.
The current loan will be used to purchase construction supplies (cement, bricks, metal sheets, windows, doors and frames) and to pay for labor in order to continue building his house.
Arnaldo's hope is to finish building his house and get more funding from Hluvuku-Adsema.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, bricks, metal sheets, windows, doors and frames) and to pay for labor in order to finish building his house.

loans.name: Jovenes Activos Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado  Jovenes Activos  está en su Tercer Ciclo del programa de comité de jóvenes, donde todos se comprometieron a trabajar y a ayudarse entre todas para salir adelante.  Son jóvenes que quieren dar su primer paso para poder ayudar a sus familias e ir incursionando en nuevas actividades.
Maria es estudiante y se dedica a la venta de bijouterie, es una joven que quiere ser alguien en la vida, con un gran potencial. Desea ser una profesional el día de mañana y ayudar a su familia.
Solicita de este crédito para invertirlo en sus estudios y también para comprar insumos de su bijouterie, lo que le permitirá luchar por sus metas. En la foto aparecen los jóvenes con una de las madres, quien es codeudora y siempre les ayuda.
texts.en:
The group called "Jovenes Activos" or "Active Youth" is in its 3rd loan cycle with the program for the committee on youth.  All of the group members promise to work and help each other to get ahead.  They are young people who want to take a first step to help their families and to begin exploring new work activities.  Maria is a student and works selling jewelry. She is a young woman who wants to become someone in life with her great potential. She wants to be a professional in the future and to help her family.

She is asking for a loan in order to invest in her studies and also to buy products for her jewelry, which will help her fight for her goals.  In the picture you can see the youth with one of the mothers, who is a co-loan recipient and always helps them.

loans.use: To pay for studies and to purchase products for making jewelry for sale.

loans.name: Mujeres Alegres Group

texts.es:
Mujeres Alegres es de la ciudad de Caacupé, está integrado por 19 mujeres muy trabajadoras que están luchando por ir mejorando sus vidas y la de sus familias. Ven una gran esperanza en el programa de comité y apuestan en el.
La señora Felina es presidenta del comité ella se dedica a la elaboración de canastos y el crédito que solicita lo quiere invertir en una nueva actividad que es la venta de plantas, y de esa forma poder hacer ambos trabajos para mejorar sus ingresos y seguir ayudando a su familia. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora que con su sacrificio está saliendo adelante.
texts.en:
Mujeres Alegres Group is from the city of Caacupé.  It's made up of 19 very hardworking women who are striving to keep improving their families' lives.  They see great hope in the bank program and they're investing in it.

Felina, the president of the group, earns a living making baskets.  The loan she's requesting is for a new activity, selling plants.  This way she can do both jobs to improve her income and continue helping her family.

She's a very hardworking person who's getting ahead with her sacrifice.

loans.use: to buy plants

loans.name: Genoveva

texts.es: Genoveva, a sus 40 años de edad es madre de una hija de 15 años y vive en unión libre con su pareja. Ha tenido experiencia laboral como parrillera de cocina, durante los 10 años que laboró en una empresa de comidas rápidas reconocida a nivel nacional, pero luego de quedarse sin empleo, ella tomó la iniciativa de aprovechar esa experiencia y desea montar su propio negocio de comidas rápidas donde ofrecerá pizzas, perros calientes, hamburguesas, chuzos de carne, gaseosas entre otros. Para lograr esto, Genoveva solicita el crédito como apoyo para que su idea de negocio salga a flote, éste será invertido en la compra de activos fijos (silletería, horno para pizzas) por valor de $1.800.000, pago de arriendo del local y gastos del primer mes por $900.000, compra de surtido (carnes frías, panes, salsas, gaseosas, quesos) por $1.000.000, adecuación locativa (pintura) por $600.000, utensilios y enseres de cocina (freidora, cuchillos, cucharas, escurridores, ollas) por $700.000 para un total de $5.000.0000; con esto dará inicio a su propio negocio, que le permitirá generar 2 empleos directos y mejorará sus ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar y de esta manera tendrá la posibilidad de cumplir el sueño de posicionar su negocio y brindarle una buena educación a su hija, además de mejorar la calidad de vida de toda la familia.
texts.en:
Genoveva, 40, is mother of a 15-year-old daughter; she’s in a common law relationship with her spouse.  She’s gained work experience working as a grill cook during the ten years she worked for a nationally-known fast-food firm.  But when she became unemployed she took the initiative of using that experience to open her own fast-food business where she’ll offer pizza, hot-dogs, hamburgers, meat kebabs and soft-drinks, among others.  To do so, Genoveva is asking for a loan to help her business plan take off.

The loan will be used to buy fixed assets (tables and chairs, a pizza oven) for $1.800.000, to pay rent for the locale and cover the first month’s expenses for $900.000, to buy assorted supplies (cold cuts, bread, sauces, soft-drinks, cheese) for $1.000.000, to do physical upgrades (paint) for $600.000 and to buy utensils and kitchen equipment (deep fryer, knives, spoons, colanders, pots) for $700.000 for a grand total of $5.000.000.  

With this she’ll be able to start her business that will generate two direct employment opportunities and will improve her income for home support and she will be in the possibility of reaching her dream of positioning her business and providing a good education for her daughter as well as to improve the quality of life of her entire family.

loans.use: to buy equipment and supplies, to pay rent, to buy utensils and to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es: Claudia con 37 años de edad es soltera y no tiene hijos. Actualmente se encuentra realizando estudios de psicología y se ha capacitado sobre temas como farmacodependencia. Por falta de oportunidades laborales y con ganas de ejercer la profesión para la cual se prepara, ella decide iniciar un centro de rehabilitación para personas con problemas de farmacodependencia y víctimas de violencia sexual, para lo cual cuenta con el apoyo de una amiga que es psicóloga profesional que la orientará en el ejercicio y el trato que se debe tener con sus futuros clientes. Claudia con su visión emprendedora, su alto sentido social y gana s de salir adelante se motiva para solicitar el crédito que será invertido en la compra de silletería, mesas, armarios y realizar adecuaciones en el local, todo esto con el fin de poder atender a sus pacientes, de una manera humana, cómoda y segura, que le permita realizar actividades como conferencias familiares, terapias y acompañamiento para estas personas que están en riesgo de ser excluidas socialmente. Con esto, Claudia desea progresar, adquirir los recursos para su subsistencia, pero lo que más la motiva es saber que podrá cumplir el sueño de apoyar a personas que requieren especial atención, amor y compañía y, contribuir al mejoramiento de la calidad de vida de sus pacientes y sus familias.
texts.en:
Claudia, 37, is single and has no children.  She’s studying Psychology and has trained in subjects dealing with drug dependency.  Due to the lack of employment opportunities and wishing to practice the profession she’s preparing for, she’s decided to start a rehab center for people with drug dependency problems and for victims of sexual abuse.  To do so, she has the support of a friend who is a professional psychologist who will guide her in the exercise and treatment she must have with her future clients.

Claudia hopes to get ahead by means of her enterprising vision and her high social sense and is motivated thus to request a loan to buy tables and chairs, cabinets and to make physical upgrades to the locale.  All of this is aimed at being able to treat her patients in a humane, comfortable and safe way that will make it possible for her to carry out activities like family conferences, therapy and companionship for these people who are in danger of being socially excluded.

With this, Claudia hopes to make progress and to acquire resources to subsist but what motivates her the most is knowing that she’ll be able to reach her dream of helping people that need special attention, love and companionship and to contribute to improving her patients’ and their families’ quality of life.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs, cabinets and to make physical improvements to the locale.

loans.name: Ever Augusto

texts.es: Ever, a sus 55 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su compañera y es padre de 6 hijos. Por falta de oportunidades laborales, él y su familia han pasado por situaciones económicas difíciles, pero su empuje, fortaleza, empeño y las ganas de salir adelante, lo motivaron para iniciar su propio negocio en compañía de su esposa, hace un año aproximadamente, adecuó la sala de su casa y allí ofrece el servicio de sala de internet, con lo cual ha retomado labores y ha podido generar ingresos para el sostenimiento de su gran familia. Ever y su esposa trabajan arduas jornadas, pues abren todos los días de la semana, desde las 8:00 am hasta las 8:pm. Actualmente solicita el crédito con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de 2 equipos de trabajo (computadores) para ampliar el negocio y satisfacer la demanda que tiene, ya que con los equipos que posee no logra cubrirla. esto le permitirá mejorar sus ventas y sus ingresos familiares y permitirá avanzar hacia el cumplimiento de su principal meta, que es tener su negocio muy organizado, con equipos de muy buena calidad y prestar un excelente servicio, así mejorará el bienestar y la calidad de toda la familia y podrá brindarle una excelente educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Ever is 55 years old. He lives in a common-law marriage with his partner and has 6 children. Due to lack of work opportunities, Ever and his family have been through difficult financial situations, but Ever's spirit, strength and desire to get ahead in life motivated him to open his own business. Together with his wife, they refurbished the living room of their house about a year ago and opened a home-based Internet Cafe. This has allowed them to generate income and provide for their large family. Ever and his wife work long hours. They open every day of the week from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m.
Ever is asking for a loan to invest in the purchase of two work stations (computers) to expand his business and meet the demands of his customers, which he cannot do with his current equipment. This will improve his sales and family income. It will also allow Ever to move towards achieving his goal of having a well organized business, with quality equipment and able to provide excellent service. This in turn will improve his family's well-being and quality of life and will allow Ever to provide an excellent education for his children.

loans.use: to purchase two computers

loans.name: Kelly Juliett

texts.es: Kelly, a sus 27 años de edad es separada y madre cabeza de hogar, vive con sus dos hijos de 7 y 10 años. Hace 6 años se dedicaba a vender mercancía y productos por catálogo, actividad que realizó durante 3 años y que aprendió gracias a una tía que ejercía esa labor; de esa forma ella obtenía los ingresos necesarios para llevar el sustento diario a su hogar. Pero, debido a una oportunidad laboral que consiguió para emplearse en una empresa, tuvo que terminar con ese negocio. Hoy en día, Kelly desea complementar su labor en la empresa y generar ingresos adicionales para su familia, por lo cual toma la iniciativa de retomar la actividad de venta de mercancía y productos Amway, por tal motivo solicita el apoyo del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de surtido (cremas corporales, productos de aseo para el hogar, productos de aseo personal) con el fin de tener disponibilidad de productos y ofrecerle a sus clientes que serán familiares, amigos, compañeros de trabajo y vecinos del sector donde reside. Con esto podrá adquirir recursos adicionales para el sostenimiento de la carga económica de su hogar, brindarle una mejor educación a sus hijos y darles la oportunidad de tener un futuro próspero y exitoso, que permita mejorar la calidad de vida a mediano plazo.
texts.en: Kelly, age 27, is separated. She is a mother and the head of her family; she lives with her two children, ages 7 and 10. She started selling merchandise and products from a catalogue six years ago, and did this for three years. She learned the business from an aunt who did the same work. This is how she made an income to support her family. However, because of a job opportunity with a company, she had to close her business. Today, Kelly wants to complement her work at the company with an additional income for her family. She has decided to take her business back up. She will sell merchandise and Amway products, so she is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of stock (body lotion, household products, and toiletries). Her goal is to have a good stock available to offer her clients, who will be her family members, friends, co-workers and neighbours. This will allow her to make an additional income to sustain her household and provide her children with a better education. This will give them an opportunity to have a prosperous and successful future, and improve their quality of life in the future.

loans.use: to buy stock (body lotion, household products, and toiletries).

loans.name: Dany Alexander

texts.es: Alexander, con 21 años de edad se dedica a trabajar como operario agrícola en un cultivo de flores pero, de manera alterna y para generar ingresos extra, desea iniciar con su propio negocio y aprovechar la oportunidad que se le presentó de comprar una tienda de abarrotes y legumbres que está vendiendo un vecino del sector donde reside, con esto podrá aumentar su nivel de ingresos para aportar al sostenimiento del hogar de sus padres. Alexander es un joven enérgico, activo, pujante y tiene muchas ganas de prosperar, por esta razón se motiva a solicitar el crédito, que será invertido en la compra del negocio para iniciar a laborar en los tiempos libres y además contratará a un familiar para que lo apoye el resto del tiempo, pues espera en un futuro cercano, poder retirarse de su actual empleo, pues manifiesta que las jornadas laborales son muy arduas y el salario no justifica todo el esfuerzo que realiza. Alexander sueña con ver crecer su negocio, lograr que tenga un reconocimiento en todo el sector y que le permita obtener buenos ingresos para salir adelante y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Alexander, 21, works as an agricultural laborer on a flower farm but in order to earn extra income he wants to start his own business and take advantage of an opportunity of buying a grocery and vegetable store being sold by one of his neighbors that’s presented itself to him.  With this he will be able to increase his income level to contribute to the support of his parents’ home.  

Alexander is an energetic, active, driven young man who very much wants to make progress.  Because of this, he’s motivated to request the loan that will be used to buy the business to start working in his free time.  He will also hire a family member to help him out the rest of the time because in the near future he’d like to leave his current job because he says the work days are very demanding and the salary isn’t commensurate with all the effort he puts into it.

Alexander dreams with seeing his business grow becoming very well-known in the sector that will make it possible for him to earn good income to get ahead and to improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy an already existing store.

loans.name: Gidda

texts.en:
Gidda is married with two children, both of whom go to school. She also takes care of additional family members (old parents). 

She has a business of selling cosmetics, and has been in this business for two years. She has applied for a loan of 700,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more boxes of cream relaxers, braids, toilet soap, make-up (facials) and weaves. 

Gidda moves door to door selling cosmetics. She sells on a retail basis seven days out of every week. Her major business challenges include seasonality, the increasing prices of cosmetics, and thieves. 

She resides in her own house, and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and paying for electricity bills.

loans.use: to buy more boxes of cream relaxers, toilet soap, make-up (facials), weaves and braids.

loans.name: Monday Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Monday están en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde ninguna se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, pero se encuentran trabajando por ir mejorando sus ingresos.
Norma forma parte de este grupo, ella es costurera, y comenta que tiene un taller en su casa, donde atiende a sus clientes. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora, y que siempre ha tenido que trabajar para salir adelante. Pide este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de telas para sus confecciones, ya que quiere poder cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en: The group called "Monday" is in its first loan cycle with the program for the committee on women.  All of the group members are participating in the survey for the elimination of poverty, and none of these group members fall below the poverty line, but they are working to improve their incomes. Norma is part of this group.  She is a seamstress and comments that she has a shop in her home where she waits on her customers.  She is a very hard-working person who has always had to work in order to get ahead.  She is asking for a loan in order to invest in the purchase of fabrics for her creations.  She wants to be able to meet the needs of her customers.

loans.use: To buy fabrics for sewing.

loans.name: Niño Jesus Group

texts.es:
Niño Jesus hace tres ciclos que está trabajando, forman parte del programa de comité de la fundación paraguaya, y también están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, como medio para conocer la situación que tiene una de ellas.
Podemos destacar a Julia, quien a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo quiere mejorar  su situación de pobreza. Está trabajando para ello por medio de la venta de cosméticos, y comenta que tiene ya muy buena clientela. Su secreto es siempre tener mucha variedad que poder ofrecer a sus clientas, y así cumplir con ellas.
Hoy solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de cosméticos de toda marca, para que de esa forma pueda seguir con sus ventas y ayudando a su familia con los ingresos que obtenga.
texts.en: Niño Jesus (Baby Jesus) is in its third loan cycle with Fundación Paraguaya and is participating in the poverty elimination survey to determine the status of the members. We can point to Julia who, through her efforts and her job selling cosmetics, wants to improve her economic situation. She says she has many customers; her secret is to always have a variety of merchandise to offer them to meet their needs. Julia has applied for a loan to buy a variety of cosmetic brands so that she can maintain her sales and help her family through the income she earns.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.pt:
