She will use this loan to restock more spare parts to resell. She dreams of owning a wholesale spare parts shop and finishing her house. 

She will share this loan with her loan group, "NISSAN," which totals five members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock more spare parts to resell.

loans.name: Wanawangurumo Group

texts.en:
As an active member of Wanawangurumo group, Nuru has been running a business selling phone accessories like phone covers, chargers and airtime. She also offers phone charging services. 

Nuru is a married woman in her late 20s with a baby girl. She is doing great with her family and business as well. She works from 7 a.m. to 6 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair profit per month. 

This will be her seventh loan request from Tujijenge Tanzania. With the previous loans, all of which she paid back successfully, she managed to replenish the phone accessories that already had sold. Nuru used her business profit to increase her savings and reinvest back into her business. 

She will use this loan to buy more phone accessories. She dreams that one day she will be able to expand her business by selling more accessories together with phones. 

She will share this loan with her loan group, "Wanawangurumo," which totals eight members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more phone accessories.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es: Ricardo, con 50 años de edad es padre soltero de 3 hijos. Desde que su esposa lo abandonó, él quedó a cargo de sus hijos, por los cuales  ha luchado incansablemente para sacarlos adelante. Desde hace 7 años se dedica a la comercialización de heno, el cual compra a cultivadores cercanos y lo distribuye a un precio más alto en varias ciudades del país, como Cali, Medellín y Bogotá; esta actividad la aprendió gracias a un amigo.  Ricardo día a día se esfuerza para conseguir el sustento para su hogar, pues su labor es inestable y debe sobrepasar diferentes desafíos como el clima, que en invierno daña los cultivos de heno y por lo tanto su costo de compra se incrementa, haciendo difícil su comercialización, a pesar de todos los obstáculos, él con su actitud positiva, emprendedora y activa va en busca de opciones que le permitan seguir adelante, por esa razón se motiva a solicitar el crédito con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de heno al por mayor (2 viajes) ya que al comprarlo de contado le ofrecen descuentos y esto lo puede aprovechar para aumentar su ganancia. Esto se verá reflejado a largo plazo, en el cumplimiento de su principal sueño, que es montar una distribuidora agropecuaria y adquirir una finca productora de heno, para así incrementar sus ingresos y brindarle a sus hijos un mejor bienestar, mejor educación y calidad de vida para que su futuro sea próspero y exitoso.
texts.en:
50 year old Ricardo is a single father with 3 children. Since his wife left him he has looked after the children and has fought tirelessly to bring them up properly. For the last 7 years he has been selling hay, which he buys from nearby growers and sells on at a higher price in various cities in the country such as Cali, Medllín and Bogotá. He learnt the business from a friend. Ricardo works hard every day to provide sustenance for his family. His work is not stable and he has to overcome various challenges such as the weather, which damages the hay crop in the winter and so his purchase cost goes up, making it difficult to sell. In spite of all the obstacles, he has a positive and entrepreneurial attitude and actively seeks options which will help him to get on in life. 

This is why he is asking for the loan with the intention of buying hay wholesale (2 trips) since he is offered a discount for paying cash and he can benefit from this to increase his profit. In the long term this will be reflected in fulfilling his biggest dream, which is to set up an agricultural distribution business and buy a farm producing hay. Thus he will increase his income, improve the wellbeing of his children and give them a better education and quality of life so they can have a prosperous and successful future.

loans.use: to buy hay wholesale (2 trips) since he is offered a discount for paying cash.

loans.name: Macedonia

texts.es: Macedonia de 39 años de edad , es madre soltera de tres hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. Cuando fue joven se dedicaba a la agricultura que le sirvió para independizarse y empezar junto a su pareja y primer hijo  a buscar el crecimiento de su economía familiar. Con el paso de los años decidió cambiar de actividad y entró en el negocio de la compra y venta de bloques madereros al por mayor recibiendo el apoyo económico de sus padres para solventar sus primeras compras y logrando recuperar el dinero invertido en su primera venta a empresarios madereros de la capital. Fue gracias a esta actividad que cumplió uno de sus primeros objetivos que era la construcción su vivienda a base de material noble y luego construyo su segundo piso. Despues de su separación continuaba de manera independiente con su actividad comercial logrando ella sola mantener a sus menores hijos. Al tener varios ambientes de su casa sin usar decidió ponerlos en alquiler y sus primeros inquilinos fueron personas muy responsables en sus pagos  que le permitía obtener ingresos para cubrir otras necesidades económicas. Espera con el tiempo seguir ampliando mas ambientes de su casa para alquilarlos y por eso considera que es necesario culminar la construcción del tercer piso de su vivienda y tratar con el tiempo tener un ingreso fijo mensual. Este es su tercer préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. En esta ocasión desea contar con 4,000 nuevos soles y comprar ladrillos, cementos y fierros para mejorar los baños de los cuartos de los inquilinos.
texts.en:
Macedonia, 39, is a single mother of 3 children, whom she lives with in her own house. When she was young she worked in agriculture, which helped her become independent and start out with her partner and and first child in search of increasing their family finances. As years went by, she decided to change business and began buying and selling wood blocks wholesale. She received economic support from her parents to make her first purchases and managed to recuperate the investment on her first sale to wood dealers in the capital. It was thanks to this that she was able to meet one of her first goals and construct her home out of fine materials, later adding a second floor. 

After her separation, she continued her business independently and managed to support her young children alone. Having various areas in her house that were not in use she decided to rent them out. Her first tenants were very responsible with their payments, which allowed her to meet other economic needs with the income. In time she hopes to continue expanding more areas of her house to rent, so she is taking into account that the construction of the third floor of her home needs to be finished. She's trying to have a monthly income with time.

This is her third loan with Kiva and she feels grateful for the financial support that she receives to continue on. She promises prompt payment on her installments. On this occasion she would like to have 4,000 nuevos soles and purchase brick, cement and metal to improve the bathrooms in her tenants rooms.

loans.use: to purchase brick, cement and metal to improve her tenants' bathrooms.

loans.name: Gracian De Jesús

texts.es: Jesús, con 56 años de edad es casado y padre de 5 hijos. Toda su vida productiva se dedicaba a cultivar café en el pueblo donde nació, pero por cuestiones de violencia e inseguridad, decidió trasladarse con su familia a otro pueblo, donde un hermano le enseñó a cultivar granadilla y desde entonces esta es la actividad que le genera ingresos para llevar el sustento a su hogar. El prestatario es un hombre luchador, emprendedor, optimista y siempre está en busca de oportunidades que le permitan salir adelante, es por ello que solicita el apoyo del crédito con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas (abonos y fertilizantes, pesticidas, fungicidas) con el fin de darle continuidad a sus cultivos y sacar una cosecha óptima para venderla a un mejor precio, esto le ayudará a avanzar hacia el cumplimiento de su principal sueño, que es llegar a tener aproximadamente 2500 matas de granadilla cultivadas y comprar vacas productoras de leche para iniciar en la actividad lechera, así le brindará a sus hijos la oportunidad de tener una mejor educación, una estabilidad económica favorable que ayude a mejorar la calidad de vida de toda la familia.
texts.en:
Jesus is 56 years old. He is married and has 5 children. He dedicated all his working life to growing coffee in the village where he was born, but due to violence and insecurity issues he decided to move with his family to another village. There, his brother taught him how to grow passion fruit and this has been the activity that has generated income to provide for his family ever since.
The borrower is a determined, enterprising and optimistic man, always looking for opportunities to get ahead. This is why he is asking for a loan to invest in the purchase of farming supplies (manure and fertilizer, pesticides and fungicides) to continue with his crops and get an optimal harvest to sell at the best price. This will help him move towards achieving his main goal, which is to have approximately 2500 passion fruit plants and to buy milking cows to start a dairy business. In this way, Jesus will offer his children the chance for a better education and a favorable financial stability to improve the quality of life for all the family.

loans.use: to purchase farming supplies such as manure, chemical fertilizer, pesticides, and fungicides.

loans.name: Corina Del Carmen

texts.es: Corina de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, desde hace 5 años que se dedica a la agricultura la cual es su principal fuente de ingresos, siembra maíz y frijol con lo que gana de sus cosechas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar. Ella quiere comprar los insumos necesarios para sus cosechas como abonos, fertilizantes, semillas, herbicidas, controles de plaga, etc. pero dado que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para dicha inversión ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito ya que solo de esta forma puede continuar su proceso de cultivo. Al igual que todo campesino, deposita su confianza en la agricultura ya que no poseen otra fuente de ingresos y desea superarse haciendo lo mejor que puede en sus cultivos. Espera obtener una cosecha abundante que le permita seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar y cancelar dicho crédito.
texts.en: Corina, 39 years old, lives in her own house with her husband and her two children.  For 5 years she has worked in agriculture which is her main source of income.  She plants corn and beans.  With what she earns from her harvests she manages to cover some household expenses.  She wants to buy the necessary supplies for her harvests like manure, fertilizers, seeds, herbicides, pest controls, etc. but given that she doesn’t have the necessary economic resources for said investment she has made the decision to request a loan since only in this way can she continue her cultivation process.  Like any farmer, she places her trust in agriculture as she doesn’t have another source of income and she wants to better herself by doing the best that she can with her crops.  She hopes to obtain an abundant harvest that allows her to continue to bring home the daily bread and to pay off this loan.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizers, seeds, herbicides, pest controls, etc.

loans.name: Dario Antonio

texts.es: Darío, a sus 39 años de edad es casado y aún no tiene hijos. Nació y creció en el campo donde aprendió las labores agrícolas y el cuidado de animales, pues es una tradición familiar. Actualmente se dedica a cultivar plátano y a criar cerdos, con esto ha logrado adquirir los recursos para llevar el sustento diario a su hogar. Darío es un hombre trabajador, labora arduas jornadas en sus cultivos para evitar que le den plagas o se dañen, procurando siempre que estén en óptimas condiciones para la cosecha. Solicita el crédito como un apoyo para invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas al por mayor (abonos, fertilizantes, fungicidas y pesticidas) con el fin de preparar la tierra para un nuevo cultivo, pues en esta época es bueno labrarla para tener mejor producción. Esto le ayudará a generar más ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia y para cumplir el sueño de tener una finca con muchos cultivos, que a mediano plazo se pueda convertir en productor y distribuidor mayorista.
texts.en:
39 year old Darío is married and does not have any children yet. He was born and grew up in the countryside where he learnt how to do agricultural tasks and look after animals, since this is his family's tradition. He currently earns a living growing bananas and rearing pigs and by doing this he has been able to earn enough to cover the daily household expenses. Darío is a hard-working man and works long days in his crops to make sure they do not have any infestations or suffer damage, always making sure that they are in optimal condition for the harvest. 

He is asking for the loan to help him to buy agricultural supplies wholesale (manure, fertilizer, fungicides and pesticides) so that he can prepare the land for a new crop. This is the right time of year to prepare the land to improve the production. This will help him to generate more income to support his family and fulfil his dream of having a farm with a lot of crops, so that in the medium term he can become a producer and wholesale distributor.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies wholesale (manure, fertilizer, fungicides and pesticides).

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
This is 40-year-old Agnes, from Liberia. She resides in Paynesville South, a suburb just outside of Monrovia. The area is one of the most populated areas in Montserrado County, with one of the best standards of living in the country. Good roads, access to clean water, affordable rents, and plentiful transportation options make Paynesville South one of the most popular places to live. 

Agnes is married, with three children aged between 20 and 10. Only two of her children are currently attending school and live at home. 

She runs a table business, selling bread, butter, oil, sugar, rice, etc. in the local market.  She describes herself as a serious businesswoman. 

Agnes started her business two years ago, using money given to her by her mother. Typically, she works at her business from 7am to 4pm, Monday to Saturday, and she transports her goods to her business by bus. She cites her greatest challenge as being insufficient capital. Agnes is proud of her business because it supports her home.

Using the proceeds of this loan, Agnes intends to purchase more butter, oil, sugar, rice, etc. In the future, she plans to build her house and educate all her children. She sincerely thanks you in advance for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more butter, oil, sugar, rice, etc. to sell in the local market.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 100 meters of cloth material and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Abbas

texts.en:
Abbas is a 23-year-old, single, young man living in a village in the Bekaa valley. He is employed in a butcher shop. 

He decided to contact Al Majmoua Lebanese Association for Development and acquire a loan in order to purchase construction materials for his house. This way, he can prepare himself for any future plans or commitments. 

In the future, Abbas wishes to work hard in order to improve his living standard and open his own butchery when he becomes financially capable of taking this step forward.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for his house.

loans.name: Dilmurod

texts.ru: Дилмурод образованный и высококвалифицированный человек. Ему 51 года. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 5 детей. Детям 23, 22, 17, 15 и 12 лет. Он является основным кормильцем семьи, так как его жена учительница и имеет маленькую зарплату. Дилмурод более 26 лет работает в заводе по разработке алюминий. Он является одним из успешных работников. Дилмурод планирует отремонтировать жилой дом, так как его жилой дом имеет плохое состояние. Дилмурод планирует отремонтировать все комнаты до наступления зимы. Он не имеет деньги, для покупки строительных материалов, так как он тратит свою зарплату для содержания семьи. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 2700 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, древесину и т.п. для ремонта дома. Он ждет вашу доброту. Это его пятый займ в ИМОНе и он имеет хорошую кредитную историю.
texts.en: Dilmurod is an educated and highly qualified person.  He is 51 years old.  He is married and raising five children, who are 23, 22, 17, 15 and 12 years old.  He is the sole provider for the family because his wife is a teacher and earns a small salary.  Dilmurod has been working at an aluminium processing plant for over 26 years.  He is one of the most successful workers.  Dilmurod plans to repair his house because his house is in a bad condition.  Dilmurod plans to repair all of the rooms prior to the onset of winter.  He does not have money to buy construction materials because he spends his salary to support his family.  He is requesting a loan in the amount of 2700 somoni to buy construction materials, such as cement, wood, etc., to repair his house.  He awaits your kindness.  This is his fifth loan from IMON, and he has a good credit history.

loans.use: to buy construction materials, such as cement, wood, etc., to repair his house

loans.name: Mirzo

texts.ru: Мирзо 48 лет. Он вдовец и на воспитании имеет 5 детей. После смерти жены ему стало очень трудно воспитывать детей. Детям 24, 14, 13, 10 и 7 лет. Мирзо старается обеспечить своих детей хорошим условием проживания и чтобы его дети не почувствовали, что они не имеют мать. Мирзо с 1992 года занимается бизнесом. Он мясник. Мирзо продает мясо барана в своей лавке. Он покупает баран, сам режет и продает местным жителям. Мирзо старается обеспечить своих клиентов свежим мясом. Он имеет своих постоянных клиентов на местном рынке. Мирзо хочет развевать бизнес дальше и поэтому он запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки барана. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Mirzo is a 48 year old widower with five children. After his wife died, it was very difficult for him to raise the kids, ages 24, 14, 13, 10, and 7. Mirzo tries to provide his children with good living conditions so that they do not feel that they have no mother. Mirzo has been a butcher since 1992 and sells meat from sheep. He buys the sheep and slaughters them himself to sell to local residents and always tries to provide his customers with fresh meat. He has several regular customers at the local market. Mirzo wants to expand his business and has asked for a loan of 5000 somoni to buy more sheep. He awaits your kindness and hopes for your mercy.

loans.use: To buy sheep for his butcher shop

loans.name: Adriana María

texts.es: Adriana tiene 32 años de edad, es una mujer casada y madre de 2 hijos. Actualmente labora como operaria agrícola en un cultivo de flores, pero hace aproximadamente 2 años aprendió la actividad de vender mercancía como ropa, calzado, accesorios, perfumería entre otros, gracias a un compañero que le enseñó. Alternando con su trabajo, ella, en sociedad con una compañera del cultivo comenzaron hace 3 meses la venta de mercancía, pues luego de su jornada laboral les queda mucho tiempo libre, el cual emplea en esta actividad, con esto genera ingresos mensuales extra para aportar al sostenimiento de su hogar. Adriana es una mujer emprendedora, trabajadora, juiciosa y dedicada a su familia, eso la motiva para solicitar el crédito, con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de mercancía al por mayor (jeans, zapatos, camisetas, blusas, aretas, pulseras, anillos) con el fin de aprovechar los descuentos que le brindan por pago de contado, así tendrá mayor utilidad por las ventas y así, podrá avanzar hacia el cumplimiento de su principal sueño, que es montar su propio almacén, que le permita brindarle una mejor educación a sus hijos y una estabilidad económica que mejore la calidad de vida de toda la familia.
texts.en:
Adriana is 32 years old and is married with 2 children. Currently she works as an agricultural worker in a flower growing business but about 2 years ago she learnt the trade of selling merchandise such as clothing, footwear, accessories, perfume and other items from a colleague. Together with a colleague from the flower business she began selling merchandise 3 months ago, alternating with her work. At the end of the working day they have a lot of free time which she uses for this business and it gives her additional monthly income towards the household costs. 

Adriana is enterprising, hard-working, sensible and dedicated to her family. This encourages her to ask for the loan in order to buy merchandise wholesale (jeans, shoes, t-shirts, blouses, earrings, bracelets and rings) so she can benefit from the discounts she gets for paying in cash. This will give her a better margin on her sales and so she will be able to work towards her biggest dream which is to have a store of her own. This will enable her to give her children a better education and an economic stability which will improve the whole family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise wholesale (jeans, shoes, t-shirts, blouses, earrings, bracelets and rings).

loans.name: Sonia Maribel

texts.es:
Sonia tiene 40 años de edad de estado civil unido tiene dos hijos, vive con los hijos y el compañero en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

La VRC LA PAULINA, se encuentra ubicada en la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina, Pertenece al Cantón Pueblo Viejo se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

Sinia  se dedica a la agricutura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, además se dedica a la crianza de gallinas. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, abonos, ranger, polbillo, morocho.

 Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para las siembras y la alimentación para los animales. Las compras y ventas lo hace  en la ciudad de Ventanas.

El sueño es comprarce un lote de terreno. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y el mal clima. En el tiempo libre le gusta salir a pasear con la esposa.
texts.en:
Sonia is 40 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has two children. She lives with her children and partner in the city of Ventanas in the Los Ríos province.

The La Paulina Communal Bank is located in the Puerto Pechiche parish, in the La Paulina province, which belongs to the Pueblo Viejo canton. Its members work in agriculture and livestock.

Sonia works in agriculture, growing corn and rice and raising chickens. She requests the loan to buy seeds, urea, manure, herbicide, animal feed, and morocho (a thick corn product).

With the help of the loan, she will be able to buy the necessary items for her crops and nutritious food for her animals. She makes her purchases and sales in the city of Ventanas.

Her dream is to buy a lot of land. The challenges that she faces include pests and bad weather. In her free time, she likes to go out and spend time with her husband.

loans.use: seeds, urea, manure, herbicide, animal feed, and morocho (a thick corn product).

loans.name: Patricia Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora Patricia, habitante del municipio de Nindiri, junto a su compañero de vida el cual trabaja para apoyarla con  los gastos del hogar , su mayor sueño y meta a lograr es mejorar sus condiciones de vidad y construir en su totalidad su vivienda de bloques para poder vivir  mejor , doña patricia labora como agricultura , en la siembra de Yuca , la mayor afectación que se le presenta es la falta de agua  , el crédito lo quiere para materiales de siembra tales como , postes , madera de yuca para el cultivo , fertilizantes e insumos .Principalmente la preparación de la tierra .
texts.en:
Patricia is a resident of Nindiri township, together with her life partner who works to support her with household expenses.  Her biggest dream and goal is to improve her living conditions and to build a cinder block house so as to live better.  

Patricia has worked in agriculture, in yuca planting. Her biggest problem is the lack of water.  She is applying for this loan to buy planting materials such as poles, yuca wood, fertilizers, and supplies.  It is mainly for land preparation.

loans.use: to maintain crops

loans.name: Aleyda Maryinee

texts.es: Doña Aleyda, es una señora madre de 3 hijos, siendo el mayor de 21 años, dos de ellos van a la universidad, su esposo taxista y ella continua con su negocio de venta de ropa, bolsos, zapatos de segunda mano, con sus ingresos apoya a sus hijos a continuar sus estudios, ya que es la única herencia que les puede dejar, el formarlos profesionalmente. Aleyda solicita el crédito para invertir en el negocio comprando pacas variadas para damas, caballeros y niños, agradece el crédito brindado, con lo que ella tiene las posibilidades de prosperar con las ventas, en vista de que no cuenta con fondos propios para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Aleyda is the mother of 3 children. The oldest is 21 years old and two of her children are attending college. Her husband is a taxi driver and she continues with her business of selling second hand clothes, purses and shoes. She supports her children in their education with her revenues, since professional training is the only inheritance she's able to give them. 

Aleyda requests the loan in order to invest in her business, by purchasing assorted bundles of used clothing for ladies, gentlemen and children. She is thankful for the loan, with which she will have the possibility to thrive in her sales since she has no funds of her own to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy assorted bundles of used clothing for ladies, gentlemen and children

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay day laborers who help him to clean and prune on his farm, and to buy organic fertilizers to increase his production.

loans.name: Marta Sonia

texts.es: Doña Sonia, quien con su esposo procrearon 4 hijos los cuales son mayores de edad e independientes, ahora ella trabaja para la manutención de su esposo quien es jubilado y para ella. Continúa con su labor vendiendo ropa de segunda y variedades. Solicita el crédito para poder invertir en su negocio con mercaderías variadas para vender y garantizar el pan de cada día en su hogar.
texts.en:
Sonia is married and has four children with her husband who are adults and independent.  Now she works to support herself and her husband, who is retired.  She has continued her past work of selling varieties of secondhand clothing.  

She is requesting this loan to invest in her business with various goods to sell, and to guarantee she will have bread each day in her home.

loans.use: to invest in varieties of second-hand clothing

loans.name: Marcos Antonio

texts.es: Don Marco, habitante del barrio Dimitrov, una zona con alto índice delincuencial, por lo que el cuida mucho de sus hijos quienes en la actualidad están en la universidad y espera se preparen para que tengan una vida mejor. Marco continua con el negocio en su pequeña pulpería que atiende junto con su esposa. Desea invertirle más productos para vender, es por eso que solicita el crédito para comprar variedades como granos básicos pollo, carnes, cereales, golosinas entre otros. Con estos productos espera recuperar lo que perdió a causa de un robo que sufrió en su negocio, siendo este el único medio de generar ingresos para los gastos de la familia.
texts.en:
Marco lives in the Dimitrov neighborhood, an area with high crime rates.  For this reason he takes extra care with his children, who are currently attending university. He hopes that this will prepare them well so that they can have a better life. 

Marco continues to do business at his small grocery, which he runs with his wife. He wants to invest in more products to sell, and for this reason he is requesting a loan to buy various merchandise such as basic grains, chicken, meat, cereals, and candy, among other items. With these products, he hopes to make back losses the business suffered from a robbery, as his store is his only source of generating income for his family's expenses.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, chicken, meat, cereals, candy, and other items.

loans.name: Gado

texts.ru: Дом, где живет  Гадо и его семья не отвечает стандартам жилья и он срочно должен отремонтировать свой дом. Ему 53 года, он женат и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Дети совершеннолетние. Гадо является основным кормильцем семьи. Он более 30 лет работает в Институте искусств. Данное время он является деканом факультета. Гадо очень любит свою работу и ему нравится работать с студентами, которые имеют разные видения и потенциал. Гадо выдал свою дочь замуж и скоро они сыграют ее свадьбу. Однако его дом имеет плохое состояние, и он не может принимать гостей в таком доме. Гадо  запрашивает займ на сумму  1000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, краски, древесину и т.п. для ремонта дома. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: The house, where Gado and his family live, does not comply with living standards, and he has to urgently repair his house.  He is 53 years old, married and raising two children, who are grown.  Gado is the sole provider for his family.  He has been working at the Arts Institute for over 30 years.  At the present time, he is a department dean.  Gado loves his work very much and likes to work with students, who have different visions and potential.  Gado married off his daughter, and her wedding will be held soon.  However, his house is in a bad condition and he cannot entertain guests in such a house.  Gado is requesting a loan in the amount of 1000 somoni to buy construction materials, such as cement, paint, wood, etc., to repair his house.  He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy construction materials, such as cement, paint, wood, etc., to repair his house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials:  cement, iron, wire, cinder blocks, zinc sheets, and purlins.

loans.name: Diego Gerardo

texts.es:
DIEGO tiene 50 años de edad de estado civil unión libre tiene ocho hijos, vive con los hijos y la esposa en la ciudad de Ventanas provicnia de los ríos.

La VRC LA PAULINA, se encuentra ubicada en la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina, Pertenece al Cantón Pueblo Viejo se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

DIEGO se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, además se dedica a la crianza de gallinas y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, abonos, polvillo y morocho.

 Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para las siembras y la alimentación para los animales. Las compras y ventas lo hace  en la ciudad de Ventanas.

El sueño es comprarse un lote de terreno. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es sembrar 10 cuadras de cacao. En el tiempo libre le gusta reunirce con la familia.
texts.en:
Diego is 50 years old and lives in a common-law marriage with his wife and their eight children in the city of Ventanas, in the province of Los Rios.
The “La Paulina” communal bank is located in Puerto Pechinche Parish, Recinto La Paulina belonging to Pueblo Viejo Canton; they work in agriculture and animal husbandry. 
Diego works in agriculture, growing corn and rice and he also raises chickens and pigs. He is requesting the loan to buy seeds, urea, manure, animal feed and a type of dense corn ("morocho"). 
With help from the loan he will be able to buy what’s needed for the crops and feed for his animals. He makes his purchases and his sales in the city of Ventanas. 
His dream is to buy a piece of land and the challenge he faces is to plant ten ‘cuadras’ [unit of land measurement] of cocoa beans. He likes to get together with his family in his free time.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, urea, fertilizer, animal feed and dense corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bags of charcoal

loans.name: Kadzo

texts.en: Kadzo lives in the Malindi area where she runs a grocery store. She is 29 years old and married with one child. She also farms in Malindi. Her grocery store deals mostly with fruit. She wants to be supplying fruit to the whole town. She learned about Milango through friends and she decided to join so that she could access credit to fund her small venture. She seeks a loan to buy mangoes, passion fruit and other groceries for her shop. The loan will improve her standard of living and also help her build a house for her son, who is disabled. The challenge that she faces in the business is competition from other traders.

loans.use: to buy mangoes, passion fruit and other groceries

loans.name: Naji

texts.en:
Naji is a 35-year-old married father of three children. For a living, he has been preparing the farm lands by driving his tractor across the fields for the past ten years. His wife is unemployed, meaning that his business is the only financial resource for the family. 

He decided to contact Al Majmoua and acquire a loan because his family lives in a very dire situation, and any improvement in his work could benefit the family. Thus, the loan would allow him to purchase a kit for his tractor, improving his efficiency. In the future, he would like to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase a kit for his tractor, improving his efficiency

loans.name: Janeth Del Socorro

texts.es: Janeth tiene 32 años, habita en el barrio 9 de junio de Managua, su esposo trabaja en servicios de cómputo, ambos procrearon dos hijos de 8 y 14 años de edad quienes están estudiando, ella se dedica  a vender ropa y cosméticos, un negocio pequeño con el que intenta salir adelante para poder brindarle a sus hijos una buena educación. El crédito que solicita es para invertirle a la venta comprando dos pacas de ropas mixtas, los cuales surtan su tiendita y ofrecer variedad a los clientes.
texts.en:
Janeth is 32 years old. She lives in the 9 de junio neighborhood, in Managua. Her husband works with computers. They have two children, aged 8 and 14, who study. Janeth sells clothes and cosmetics, a small business with which she tries to get ahead in order to give her children a good education. 

Janeth is requesting a loan to buy two bales of assorted clothes, in order to stock her store and offer her clients a wider variety.

loans.use: to buy two bales of assorted clothes.

loans.name: Luis

texts.en:
Luis is 60 years old and from Talibon, Bohol. He is married with three grown children. For forty years, Luis has operated a sari-sari (variety) store business offering different merchandise usually consumed by Filipino household. He sells items such as canned goods, chips, cooking oil, sugar, coffee, and toiletries. 

Luis is asking for a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy additional stocks of merchandise such as noodles, shampoo, coffee, canned goods, and seasoning.

In the future, he hopes to maintain and expand his business so he can meet his needs for old age.

loans.use: to buy noodles, shampoo, coffee, canned goods, and seasoning

loans.name: Olimpio Valentin

texts.es:
OLIMPIO tiene 63 años de edad de estado civil unión lire tiene tres hijos, vive con los hijos y la compañera en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

La VRC LA PAULINA, se encuentra ubicada en la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina, Pertenece al Cantón Pueblo Viejo se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

OLIMPIO  se dedica a la agricutura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, además se dedica a la crianza de gallinas y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, abonos, ranger, polbillo, morocho.

 Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para las siembras y la alimentación para los animales. Las compras y ventas lo hace  en la ciudad de Ventanas.

El sueño es comprarce un lote de terreno para seguir sembrando. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y el mal clima. En el tiempo libre le gusta salir a pasear con la esposa.
texts.en:
Olimpio is 63 years old, is in a common-law marriage and has three children. His lives with his wife and children in the city of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos. In his free time he likes to go out walking with his wife.

The communal bank La Paulina is located in the parish of Puerto Pechiche, rural settlement La Paulina, belonging to the cantón of Pueblo Viejo. The members work in agriculture and livestock.

Olimpio works in agriculture growing corn and rice as well as rearing chickens and pigs. The challenges he faces are pests and bad weather. He does his buying and selling in the city of Ventanas.

He is asking for the loan to buy seeds, urea, fertilizer, Ranger [brand of herbicide], animal feed and morocho [type of corn]. With the help of the loan he will be able to buy what he needs for his crops and food for the animals. His dream is to buy a piece of land so he can continue growing crops.

loans.use: to buy seeds, urea, fertilizer, Ranger [brand of herbicide], animal feed and morocho [type of corn].

loans.name: Annet

texts.en: Annet  is married with five children, four in school.  She also takes care of her elderly parents. She sells used shoes and has been in this business for 10 years. She works at the market six days a week and sells on a retail basis only. Her major business challenges include transportation and thieves. She is aspiring to become a wholesaler and also to start importing used clothes. She resides in her own house and the family has no access to electricity or piped water. Her monthly expenses includes school fees and feeding the family

loans.use: To buy more bales of used shoes.

loans.name: Norma Maricela

texts.es:
NORMA  tiene 26 años de edad  de estado civil unión libre tiene un hijo, vive con el hijo en casa de los suegros en Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

La VRC LA PAULINA, se encuentra ubicada en la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina, Pertenece al Cantón Pueblo Viejo se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

NORMA se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, además se dedica a la crianza de gallinas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, abonos, insecticidas y balanceados de cianza y engorde.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá dar tratamiento a los cultivos de arroz y maíz. Las compras y ventas lo hace  en la ciudad de Ventanas.

El sueño es comprarce una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta escuchar música.
texts.en:
Norma is 26 years old and has a son from a common-law relationship. She lives with her son in the house of her in-laws in Ventanas, Los Rios Province.

La Paulina communal bank is located in Recinto La Paulina, Puerto Parish, part of Pueblo Viejo Canton. The members are farmers and raise livestock.

Norma farms, planting corn and rice as well as raising chickens. She is asking for this loan to buy seeds, urea, manure, insecticides and balanced feed for raising and fattening her chickens. With the help of the loan she can care for her rice and corn crops. She will buy the supplies in the city of Ventanas. 

Her dream is to buy a house. In her spare time she enjoys listening to music.

loans.use: to buy seeds, urea, manure, insecticides and balanced feeds for rearing and fattening chickens.

loans.name: Sia

texts.en:
Sia is at 40 and married with three children between the ages of 4 and 13. She runs a  palm oil business in Torkpoi town Bo, Southern area in Sierra Leone. She started this business in order to support her husband to educate the children.   

She's been in this business for 15 years and sells palm oil and coconut oil at her place of business.  She says that the main challenges to her business are difficulty transporting her goods and a poor business location.

Sia requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more bags of gari and palm oil for resale. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her to feed her family and have a permanent business location. In the future, she would like to open a local food store enterprise. She is grateful for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more bags of gari and palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Sao

texts.en:
Sao is at 34 and married with three children between the ages of 2 and 10. She runs a palm oil business in Torkpoi town, Bo, Southern area in Sierra Leone. She started this business in order to create a permanent source of income.   

She's been in this business for eight years and sells pepper and palm oil at her place of business.  She says that the main challenges to her business are difficulty transporting her goods and a poor business location.

Sao requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more bags of pepper and palm oil for resale. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her to feed her family and find a permanent business location. In the future, she would like to open a local food store enterprise. She is grateful for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more bags of pepper and palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Nelson Agustin

texts.es:
NELSON  tiene 33 años de edad de estado civil unión libre tiene cuatro hijos, vive con los hijos y con la esposa en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia d elos ríos.

La VRC LA PAULINA, se encuentra ubicada en la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina, Pertenece al Cantón Pueblo Viejo se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

NELSON  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, además se dedica a la crianza de gallinas y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, abonos, gallinas y  cerdos y alimento para los animales.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para las siembras y los animales. Las compras y ventas lo hace  en la ciudad de Ventanas.

El sueño es tener un terreno y una casa. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es comprarce un carro. En el tiempo libre le gusta asistir a la iglesia.
texts.en:
Nelson, 33, lives in a common-law marriage and has four children. He lives with them and his wife in the city of Ventanas, Los Ríos province. Communal bank La Paulina is located in the village Puerto Pechiche, Recinto La Paulina, which is located in the Pueblo Viejo canton. The main activities in the region are agriculture and livestock.

Nelson works with agriculture, growing corn and raising chickens and pigs. He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, urea, compost, chickens, pigs and animal feed. With this loan, he will be able to buy everything he needs for his plantations and his animals. He will buy the supplies in the city of Ventanas.

His dream is to have his own land and a house. His challenge is to buy a car. During his free time, he likes to go to church.

loans.use: to buy seeds, urea, chickens, pigs and feed.

loans.name: Milly

texts.en:
Milly is married with three children, and all her children go to school. She also takes care of additional family members, including her young brothers. 

She has a business of a beauty salon and has been in this business for eight years. She has applied for a loan of 500,000 Uganda shillings from MCDTSACCO to buy more boxes of cosmetics, weaves, and braids. She also generates additional income through selling soft drinks. 

She works from home and sells on a retail basis seven days a week. Her challenges include seasonality and ever increasing prices of cosmetics. She aspires to own a bridal salon and also to buy land and build her own house. Her monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: to buy more boxes of cosmetics, braids, and weaves.

loans.name: Muzafar

texts.ru: Музафару 24 года. Он живет в сельской местности, далеко от города. Музафар добросовестный человек и он имеет порядочную и благополучную семью. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка, которому недавно исполнилась 2 года. Он более 5 лет занимается предоставлением услуги мастера по ремонту дома. Он хорошо знает все тонкости своего дела. Музафар получил это мастерство от своего отца. Его отец тоже был хорошим мастером деревни. Его брат не имеет работу и ему срочно необходимо найти работу и зарабатывать деньги. Его брат хочет уехать в Российскую Федерацию, но не имеет денег для покупки авиабилета. Он попросил Музафара помочь ему. Музафар с такой целью обратился за займом. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки авиабилета для брата. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Muzafar is 24 years old. He lives in a rural area, far away from town. Muzafar is a conscientious person. He has a good  tight-knit family. He is married and is raising one child, who recently turned two. For over five years, Muzafar has been providing services as a home repairs contractor. He is a master of his trade. He has learned his trade from his father, who was known as a good tradesman in his village too. Muzafar’s brother is unemployed and must urgently find a job and start earning money. He would like to go to the Russian Federation for work but lacks the funds for an airfare. He has asked Muzafar to help him. This is the reason Muzafar has applied for a loan. He is applying for a loan in the amount of 3,000 TJS to buy an airplane ticket for his brother. He is counting on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy an air ticket for his brother.

loans.name: Mario Abel

texts.es: Mario, es habitante del barrio Georgina Andrade, una zona donde los habitantes son de muy escasos recursos, junto a su esposa busca como salir adelante y brindarles los estudios a sus hijos quienes tienen las edades de 10 y 12 años. Mario se dedica a la venta de espejos y cuadros decorados, los cuales es muy usual verlos a menudo en las casas Nicaragüenses, los compra ya elaborados y los vende. El solicita el apoyo de crédito para poder invertir en su negocio, ya que este es el único medio de ingresos para el sustento de la familia.
texts.en:
Mario lives in the Georgina Andrade neighborhood, a place where inhabitants have very few resources. He and his wife are looking for ways to get ahead and provide their children, who are 10 and 12 years old, the opportunity to study. 

Mario works selling mirrors and decorative picture frames, which are seen commonly in Nicaraguan homes. He buys them already manufactured and he resells them. He requests the support of a loan so that he may invest in his business, since this is his only means of income to provide sustenance for his family.

loans.use: to invest in mirrors and decorative picture frames.

loans.name: Jackline

texts.en:
Jackline is married and has three children, and all her children go to school. She also takes care of additional family members (maid and brother).  She owns a restaurant and has been in this business for five years.  She generates additional income by selling cold, bottled water.

She has applied for a loan of 500,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT SACCO. She will use this amount to buy ingredients to use in the meals she will serve, including more bunches of green bananas, onions, Irish and sweet potatoes, beef and fresh beans. She works at the market seven days out of every week, and sells on a retail basis only. Her major business challenges include thieves and defaulters.

She aspires to own a fully-stocked restaurant and to get enough profits so as to build her own house. She resides in a rented house, and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients to use in the meals she will serve, including Irish and sweet potatoes, beef and fresh beans

loans.name: Johnson

texts.en:
Johnson lives in Malindi area, in Kenya. He has two businesses running right now. He has a motorcycle transport business and a tea room. He is planning to set up a retail shop next to the tea room business. He wants to have a diversified portfolio of businesses in the area. The major challenges that he faces are weather and insurance charges; both of these cut his income.

He knew of Milango through friends, and now he seeks a loan. He will use the loan to buy sugar, wheat flour, maize flour and cooking oil. These items will stock the retail shop that he is planning to set up. The extra income that he raises from the business will pay school fees for his child and improve his living standard.

loans.use: to buy inventory for the new shop he is setting up, including sugar, wheat flour, maize flour and cooking oil

loans.name: Julio Alfredo

texts.es:
JULIO tiene 25 años de edad es soltero tiene un hijo, vive con el hijo en casa de los padres en la ciudad de Ventans Provincia de los ríos.

La VRC LA PAULINA, se encuentra ubicada en la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina, Pertenece al Cantón Pueblo Viejo se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

JULIO se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, además se dedica a la crianza de gallinas, patos. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, abonos, insecticidas, abono orgánico y balanceado para los animales.

 Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para las siembras de maíz, arroz. Las compras y ventas lo hace  en la ciudad de Ventanas.

El sueño es comprar una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Julio is 25 years old, single, and has one son. He lives with his son in his parent's house in the city of Ventanas, in the province of Los Ríos. The communal bank La Paulina is located in the Puerto Pechiche parish, in the district of La Paulina. This area belongs to the Pueblo Viejo region. The communal bank members make a living working in agriculture and livestock. 
Julio works in agriculture, growing corn and rice. He also raises hens and ducks. He is requesting a loan in order to buy seeds, urea, fertilizer, insecticide, organic manure and animal feed. With the help of the loan, he will be able to buy what is necessary for planting the corn and rice. He does all of the buying and selling in the city of Ventanas. His dream is to buy a house. In his free time, he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, urea, fertilizers, insecticides, manure and animal feed.

loans.name: Robinah

texts.en:
Robinah is married and has three children. All her children go to school. She also takes care of an additional family member (her sister’s child).  She has a beauty salon business, and she has been in this business for 13 years. She works in a shop, seven days out of every week. Her major business challenges includes seasonality and on-and-off electricity.

She has applied for a loan of 500,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO. She will use the loan to buy more boxes of cream relaxers, braids, weaves, and a hand dryer.

She aspires to own a fully-stocked beauty salon and to build her own house. She resides in a rented house, and the family has access to electricity, but not to piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: To buy more boxes of cream relaxers, braids, weaves, and a hand dryer.

loans.name: Henry

texts.es: El señor Henry habita en el municipio de Ticiantepe, trabaja duro para poder sacar adelante a su familia, el vende frutas y verduras todos los dias, su esposa lo apoya con los gastos del hogar ya que ella por su parte vende productos de bellazas, cosmeticos, etc. con este credito don Henry invertira en su negocio ya que quiere aprovechar la temporada alta. y el quiere obtener mejores ingresos para que sus condiciones de vida mejore y poder cumplir su sueño que es construir su casa. Agradece el apoyo que Afodenic y Fondos Kiva le han brindado.
texts.en: Henry lives in the town of Ticiantepe. He works hard every day selling fruit and vegetables to help his family get ahead. His wife helps him with the household costs by selling beauty products, cosmetics, etc. Henry will use this loan to invest in his business as he wants to take advantage of the high season. He wants to earn higher profits so that he can improve his quality of life and achieve his dream of building his own house. He is very thankful for the support Afodenic and Kiva have given him.

loans.use: To buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Doña Teresa de 42 años de edad, sus hijos ya son independientes y mayores, ella se dedica a vender literatura y su esposo trabaja en artes plásticas y pintura. Con el crédito desea invertir en levantar la pared de su casa de concreto, actualmente la tiene de madera lo que con el tiempo se irá destruyendo poco a poco, por eso antes que suceda Teresa quiere invertir en mejorar su hogar para el bienestar y seguridad de la familia.
texts.en: Teresa is 42 years old. Her children are grown up and independent. She is a bookseller and her husband works with sculptures and paintings. She wants to invest this loan in building a concrete wall for her house, which is currently made of wood and gradually decaying. Teresa wants to improve her home for the wellbeing and safety of her family.

loans.use: To buy concrete blocks, cement, sand and iron.

loans.name: Gerardo Leonel

texts.es:
GERARDO tiene 22 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

La VRC LA PAULINA, se encuentra ubicada en la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina, Pertenece al Cantón Pueblo Viejo se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

GERARDO se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, además se dedica a la crianza de gallinas y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, abonos,fertilizantes, polvillo, morocho.

 Con la ayuda del crédito podrá mejorar los sembríos y la cosecha. Las compras y ventas lo hace  en la ciudad de Ventanas.

El sueño es comprarse un lote de terreno para seguir sembrando.

 En el tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Gerardo, 22, is single and does not have any children. He lives with his parents in the city of Ventanas, province of Los Rios. The communal bank La Paulina is in the parish of Puerto Pechiche, in the zone of La Paulina. It belongs to the canton of Pueblo Viejo, where the inhabitants work in farming and livestock. 
Gerardo works as a farmer, growing corn and rice, as well as raising hens and pigs. He is asking for a loan to buy seeds, urea, compost, fertilizer, animal feed and a type of dense corn ("morocho"). With the help of the loan, he will be able to improve his plantings and his harvest. 
Gerardo does his purchases and sales in the city of Ventanas. His dream is to buy a piece of land to cultivate. In his free time he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to purchase urea, compost, fertilizer, corn and animal feed.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is married and has two children, both of whom go to school. She also takes care of an additional family member, her mother. Rose has a business of selling used clothes and has been in this business for 20 years. She has applied for a loan of 400,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT SACCO to buy more bales of used clothes. Rose generates additional income through hair plaiting. She works in a shop six days out of every week and sells on a wholesale basis only. Her major business challenges include seasonality and defaulters. 

Rose aspires to import used clothes, educate her children up to the university level, and also to build her own house. She resides in a rented house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include feeding the family and rent.

loans.use: To buy more bales of used clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a machine that creates bicycles, for her husband's bicycle-making and -sales business

loans.name: Vazha

texts.en:
Vazha is 52 years old. He lives in the Tskaltubo district with his father, who is provided with a retirement pension. Vazha requested a loan from local financial institutions several times for a family business start-up, but without any success. His loan request was rejected every the time because of his low income and his family’s poor living conditions. 

The only source of income for the family is from agricultural activities. In particular, they have a milking cow and a calf, whose milk is used in cheese products. In addition, they have a vineyard and a hectare of agricultural land where maize is grown. They sell the harvested products and cheese at local markets at a good price. It is hardly enough for food for the family. According to Credo estimations the family belongs to the subsistence poor category. 

Vazha requested a loan from Credo to start a family business. Vazha has now been approved for a loan within the framework of the new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with reasonable conditions to rural poor people who do not have access to other credit products. These rural poor people are regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of their low income. With this loan, Vazha will purchase two additional milking cows with which he will be able to produce more cheese to sell. The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva start-up loan, will significantly improve the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to purchase two milking cows

loans.name: Paulinah

texts.en: Paulinah is a Kiva borrower who describes herself as dedicated, visionary, and honest. She has taken a loan of KES 16,500 to buy a water dispenser that will benefit six family members. This will provide them access to clean water. Paulinah works in farming and rearing of livestock to earn a living. She faces the challenges of lack of capital and high transport costs in her business. This is her third loan with SMEP DTM. Previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy a water dispenser

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en:
Cecelia is a farmer from the town of Trinidad, Bohol. She is a married woman and a mother of three children. Cecelia has been in the farming business for more than six years now. She helps her husband in tilling their farm. This is the source of their income.

Cecelia is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer for the farm. With this, she and her husband will be able to improve their farm as well as their harvest. In the future, Cecelia hopes to expand their farm so that it will generate more income, which is necessary to meet the needs of the family and for the schooling of their children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for the farm

loans.name: Gloria Karina

texts.es: Gloria, tiene 32 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos y vive con ellos en una aldea del municipio de Santa Cruz de Yojoa. Gloria lleva 11 años de dedicarse a la agricultura, ella cultiva pataste. Esta producción la vende en el mercado local de la zona. con los dos prestamos anteriores ha mejorado su plantación y producción de pataste. actualmente ha solicitado un tercer préstamo por 6,000 Lempiras para seguir dándole mantenimiento al cultivo. va comprar insumos como fertilizantes y fungicidas. continua motivada a seguir ampliando y mejorando su cultivo.
texts.en: Gloria is 32 and a single mother. She and her two children live in a village in Santa Cruz de Yojoa. Gloria has worked in agriculture for 11 years, growing chayote. She sells her produce in the local market. With her two previous loans she has made improvements to her plantation and increased her yield of chayote. This time she has asked for a third loan of 6,000 lempiras for the continued upkeep of her crops. She will buy supplies such as fertilisers and fungicides. She remains motivated to carry on growing and improving her plantation.

loans.use: Compra de fertilizantes y fungicidas para el cultivo de pataste.

loans.name: Maria Reina

texts.es: María, tiene 52 años de edad, es casada, tiene dos hijos y ella vive en el municipio de San Pedro sula con su familia. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la venta de productos de AVON, Arabella, Zelsa y victoria secrete, estos productos son cremas, champú, tratamiento para el cabello, perfumes, desodorantes y maquillajes. Anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de comida pero le ha gustado más la venta de cosméticos, en este ya tiene 19 años de experiencia. Ella vende en su casa y también ambulante según pedidos. El préstamo que ha solicitado es por  14,000 Lempiras, el cual lo invertirá para la compra de las cajas de la mercadería al por mayor y de contado. Su plan es tener capital de trabajo para no comprar al crédito y seguir ampliando su negocio.
texts.en: Maria is 52 years old, married, and has two children. She lives in the city of San Pedro Sula with her family. She has been selling Avon, Arabella, Zelsa and Victoria’s Secret products for many years. The products she sells include creams, shampoo, hair treatments, perfumes, deodorants and make up. Previously she sold food, but she likes selling cosmetics more and has 19 years experience in this area. She sells from home and also makes visits to her customers, depending on the order. She is requesting a loan for 14,000 Lempiras which she will invest in the purchasing boxes of merchandise at wholesale. Her plan is to have enough capital so that she does not have to buy merchandise on credit and she can continue growing her business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise from Avon, Arabella, Zelsa and Victoria's Secret to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilisers and hire labourers to help her clean up her farm.

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is a 56-year-old married man.  He is a father of three children and he has worked as a butcher since 2006. He is multitasks in order to make sure he can provide his family with the necessities of life. George also works as a school bus driver, has a bakery, and works in construction, specializing in cement work. All of these businesses were established to cover his family's increasing expenses.

Today George is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua to buy a special meat mincing machine, a specialized "Kibbeh" making machine (Kibbeh is a delicious, traditional Lebanese food), an odor-expelling machine, and an aluminum separator. These items will improve his business a lot and increase his income.

loans.use: To buy a special meat mincing machine, a specialized kibbeh making machine, an odor-expelling machine, and an aluminum separator

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
JOSE tiene 23 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive en casa con los padres en Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

La VRC LA PAULINA, se encuentra ubicada en la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina, Pertenece al Cantón Pueblo Viejo se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

JOSE  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, abonos, insecticidas, abono orgánico.

 Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para las siembras. Las compras y ventas lo hace  en la ciudad de Ventanas.

El sueño es comprarce una moto. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es sembrar una cuadra de cacao. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar indor con los amigos.
texts.en:
Jose, 23, is single and does not have any children. He lives with his parents in Ventanas, in the province of Los Rios. The lending club La Paulina is located in the parish of Puerto Pechiche, in the zone of La Paulina. It belongs to the canton of Pueblo Viejo, where the people work in farming and cattle. Jose is a farmer, planting corn and rice. He asks for a loan to buy seeds, urea, manure, insecticides, and compost. With the help of the loan he will be able to buy the things he needs for planting. 
Jose makes his purchases and sales in the city of Ventanas. His dream is to buy a motorcycle. His challenge is planting a section of cacao. In his free time he likes to play indoor soccer with his friends.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, urea, manure, insecticides and compost.

loans.name: Ma. Delia

texts.en:
Ma. Delia is 53 years old, from the town of Talibon, Bohol. She is married and her husband finds his source of livelihood through fishing. Ma. Delia sells whatever her husband catches and she also buys fish from other fishermen in the community. In addition, she owns and operates a sari-sari store. 

Ma. Delia is asking for a loan of PHP 12,000 to be used as additional capital to buy more fresh fish and shells. With her hard work, Ma. Delia is optimistic of her plan for improvements in her business. 

In the future, she hopes to make her sari-sari store bigger for increased profits.

loans.use: to buy shells and fresh fish.

loans.name: Ursula

texts.en:
Ursula is a married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She has three children ages 14, 16, and 18. Ursula has benn engaged in a sari-sari (variety) store business for a long time now. In her store, she sell items like vinegar, soy sauce, noodles, canned goods, and snacks. She works hard for her three children so she can provide for them. 

Ursula is asking for a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy additional stocks of sugar, soy sauce, cooking oil, chips, candies, and toiletries. With this loan, she will be able to maintain a better inventory so she can have good sales on a daily basis. In the future, she hopes to have a bigger store for better business profitability and to send her children to school for a better future.

loans.use: to buy sugar, soy sauce, cooking oil, chips, candies, and toiletries

loans.name: Veronicah

texts.en:
Veronicah is a Kiva borrower and is 56 years old. She is married and has four children. She describes herself as determined. Veronicah does tailoring of clothes and selling clothes to earn an income.

Veronicah has taken a loan of KES 30,000 to buy a solar panel that will benefit six family members. This will enable them have lighting at a cheaper cost with no monthly bills. They do not have electricity. This is Veronicah's third loan with SMEP DTM. Her previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy a solar panel

loans.name: Consuelo De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Consuelo es soltera no tiene hijos vive en San Jose de Chimbo vive con Familiares.

Se dedica al comercio de granos por ya hace muchos años, el credito lo solicita para comprar electrodomesticos para la casa ya que el que tenia esta muy viejo.

El sueño de Consuelo es tener buena salud para seguir trabajamdo y tener un bebe. En los tiempos libres le gusta salir a caminar con la sobrena que tiene 5 años.
texts.en: Consuelo is single and has no children; she lives with relatives in San José de Chimbo.  She has worked selling grains for many years now and is requesting the loan to buy home appliances for her home because the one she has is very old.  Consuelo’s dream is to be in good health in order to continue working and to have a baby.  She enjoys going for walks with her five-year-old niece in her free time.

loans.use: to buy appliances

loans.name: Ilaisa

texts.en: Ilaisa is a 48 woman who is divorced with 5 children. She has a small business, lawn mowing. To earn extra income, she also has an ice cake business. Ilaisa needs a loan to to buy foam cups, cool aid, sack of sugar, engine oil, carburetor parts and spark plugs. She will use her profits to help her family and her children's education. Ilaisa joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy foam cups, cool aid, sack of sugar, engine oil, carburetor parts and spark plugs

loans.name: Jessica Del Socorro

texts.es: Jessica es una joven de 23 años de edad, habitante del barrio Hugo Chávez una zona muy vulnerable a las lluvias debido a que están a orillas del lago de Managua, tiene una relación pero su pareja tuvo que emigrar a otro país en busca de empleo, ella trabaja en contabilidad para una empresa privada, no tiene hijos aun, su deseo es poder mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda. Este crédito lo destinara en comprar ventanas y portones para ponerlos en su casa, para garantizar la seguridad a la familia.
texts.en: Jessica is a 23 year-old youth who lives in the Hugo Chavez neighborhood.  This neighborhood is very vulnerable to the rains, because it is located on the banks of Lake Managua.  She is in a relationship, but her partner had to emigrate to another country to search for work.  Jessica works in accounting for a private company.  She does not yet have children.  She wants to be able to improve the condition of her house.  She will use this loan to buy windows and gates to put in her house, to ensure the safety of her family.

loans.use: to buy a gated door and windows for her house

loans.name: Teopista

texts.en:
Teopista is married and has four children, three of whom go to school. She doesn’t take care of any additional family members. Teopista has business of selling used clothes and has been in this business for five years. She has applied for a loan of 400,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT SACCO to buy more bales of used clothes. 

Teopista doesn’t have any other income generating activities. She works in the market six days out of every week and sells on retail basis. Her major business challenges include transportation and the rainy season which hinders her customers ability to reach her. She aspires to become a wholesaler and also to buy a plot of land and build her own house. Teopista resides in a rented house and her family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy more bales of used clothes.

loans.name: Estrellita

texts.en: Estrellita is a food vendor and a farmer from the town of Trinidad, Bohol. She is a married woman and has three children. Estrellita is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer for the farm. With this, she will be able to improve her farm as well as her harvest.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for the farm

loans.name: Victor Tarquino

texts.es:
Victor tiene 47 años de edad es divorsiado vive con los padres en San Jose de Chimbo.

Victor tiene un tienda de abarrotes en donde vende productos de primera necesidad, solicita el credito para de un electrodomesticos (enfriador) para poner los embutidos y gaseosas.

Con el credito le apoyado para la compra del enfriador y que los productos no se dañe y no pierda.

El sueño es comprar un terreno para hacer una casa.

En los tiempos libres le gusta leer el periodico.
texts.en: Víctor, 47, is divorced living with his parents in San José de Chimbo.  He has a grocery store where he sells basic staples.  He requests the loan to buy appliances (refrigerator) to store the cured meats and soft-drinks.  With the loan he’ll be able to buy the refrigerator and be able to keep the products from being damaged and lost.  His dream is to buy a lot to build a house on and he enjoys reading the newspaper in his free time.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.en: Lucila is a businesswoman in El Paraiso, Sapang Dalaga. She is 43 years old, married, and has 3 children. To make a living, Lucila has a shop where she sells assorted groceries. She has been earning a monthly income of PHP 5000 and has operated her business for 5 years. Lucila has requested a loan of PHP 14,900 to purchase assorted groceries to sell. Lucila has been a member of Paglaum MPC since 2005.

loans.use: To purchase groceries and beverages

loans.name: Kenia Azucena

texts.es: Kenia, de 33 años de edad, casada, tiene 3 hijos, vive con ellos y su esposo en el municipio de la Masica Atlántida. Ella tiene su propio negocio desde hace 3 años de un salón de belleza y venta de productos cosméticos. Ofrece a sus clientes, peinados, cortes de pelo, alisados, planchados, tintes, tratamiento de uñas etc. También vende productos como tintes, cremas, champú, glases, quita esmalte etc. El negocio lo tiene en su casa y es muy conocida en la comunidad. Esta solicitando un segundo préstamo por 28,000 Lempiras para cubrir las compras al crédito y surtir mas su negocio de cremas, champú, tintes, esmaltes y otros productos que vende y usa en su salón. Su meta es hacer crecer el negocio para sacar adelante a su familia y poderle dar un mejor nivel de vida a sus hijos y poderlos graduar.
texts.en:
Kenia is 33 years old, married, and has 3 children.  She lives with her husband and children in the municipality of La Masica in the department of Atlántida.  

For 3 years, Kenia has had her own beauty salon and cosmetic sales business.  She offers her customers hairstyling, haircuts, straightening, ironing, hair color, and nail treatments, and other services. She also sells products like hair color, creams, shampoo, nail polish, and nail polish remover, etc. She has the business in her house, and she is very well-known in the community.

Kenia is requesting a second loan for 28,000 Honduran lempiras to pay for some purchases that she made on credit, and to stock her business with more creams, shampoos, dyes, nail polish, and other products that she uses and sells in her salon.  Her goal is to grow her business so that she can provide for her family and give her children a better quality of life and an education.

loans.use: to buy beauty products for her salon and to payoff pending bills for prior credit purchases

loans.name: Saturno Walter

texts.es: El cliente es del sector de Guasmo en Guayaquil.  Empezó su negocio hace 6 años, ya que anteriormente laboraba en una empresa.  Montó este negocio, dado que tenía habilidades en este campo y actualmente está localizado en la parte exterior de su domicilio.  Es casado y tiene 2 hijos, vive con uno de ellos y además con su nuera.  Su esposa es ama de casa.  Desea a futuro poder ampliar su negocio y construir el segundo piso de su casa.  Ahora, necesita el dinero para la compra de material de cerrajería para su trabajo.
texts.en: This client is from the Guasmo sector in Guayaquil.  He started his business six years ago; prior to that he was employed in a firm.  He started the business because he had skills in this field and it’s currently located in the yard outside his house.  He’s married with two children; one of them and his daughter-in-law live with him.  His wife’s a housewife.  He hopes in future to expand the business and add a second story to his house.  Now, he needs money to buy metalworking supplies for his work.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Phinoline

texts.fr: phinoline est une femme de 54 ans, veuve et mère de 5 enfants. elle gère un petit stand de vente de beignets dans un quartier de la ville depuis 15 ans. elle sollicite ce crédit pour renforcer son stock de matières premières (achat farine, sucre, poissons frais) afin de booster son chiffre d'affaires. les bénéfices générés vont être injecter dans son capital aux besoins de sa dernière fille (éducation, nutrition)et d'elle même d'autre part.
texts.en: Phinoline is a 54-year-old woman, a widow, and mother of five. She has been running a small stand selling beignets in a neighborhood in the city for fifteen years. She is requesting this loan to bolster her stock of ingredients (flour, sugar, fresh fish) in order to boost her sales. The profits generated will add to her capital and [help meet] the needs of her youngest daughter (education, nutrition), as well as her own.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for making beignets to sell

loans.name: Koshie's Group

texts.en:
This group has three members and is led by Koshie, as its representative. The businesses that the members of this group are engaged in include selling groceries and cosmetics. They will need a total amount of GHS 3900 to expand their businesses. The loan will benefit this group of micro-businesswomen, of which Koshie is a member.

Koshie says that she joined ID-Ghana four years ago and became a founding member of this group. This is her second loan request to Kiva, and fifth loan cycle with ID-Ghana. Koshie is standing in the middle in the photograph.

She currently has a business selling provisions and cosmetics. She started this business three years ago, on her own initiative. Before that, she was selling jeans. Koshie will use her part of this loan, GHS 1500, to increase her capital. She will buy items from the market, including body cream, hair cream, baby Pampers, and fruit drinks. She will sell them, by hawking to her customers. This work allows her to make an income for her family. Koshie is 30 years old, single, and has three children. When asked what she likes about ID-Ghana, Koshie replied that she likes the health insurance services and the training sessions. She says her loans have made it possible to take care of her children and her needs, by saving part of her profits and reinvestment of the other part, in her business.

loans.use: to buy items to resell by hawking, including body and hair creams, diapers, and fruit drinks

loans.name: Potofou

texts.en:
Potofou is a 50 year old married woman with one child. 
She is running a livestock business (pigs) to earn a living. Potofou has requested a loan to buy barbed wire, nails, pipes and to pay for  labour for building her (livestock shelter) pig sty.
She has been a member of SPBD since 2005. Potofou will use her profits to support her family.

loans.use: to buy barbed wire, nails, and pipes, and pay for labour

loans.name: Rosa Amelia

texts.es: La señora Rosa, es habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe, junto a su esposo sueña con ver construida su casa, ella trabaja para una empresa de Limpieza y sus esposo tambien, entre los dos luchan dia a dia para lograr su sueño, con este credito comprara Materiales como: Bloques, Hierro, Cemento, etc. Agradece el apoyo y confianza que Afodenic en conjunto a Fondos Kiva le estan brindado.
texts.en: Rosa lives with her husband in the municipality of Ticuantepe.  She dreams with seeing her house built completely.  She works for a cleaning firm and so does her husband.  The two of them strive daily to reach their dream and will use this loan to buy supplies like blocks, iron, cement, etc.  She is grateful for the support and trust Afodenic along with Kiva funds are providing her.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Celso

texts.en:
Celso is a 55-year-old married man from Talibon, Bohol. He is engaged in tricycle transport services. He transports passengers from one place to another with a certain fee.

He requested a loan of 3,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) to buy motorcycle parts and pay for maintenance to avoid hassle. In the future, Celso would like to improve his tricycle transport services to improve his livelihood status.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle parts and pay for maintenance.

loans.name: Kokou

texts.fr: Revendeur de ciment à AGOE, une localité située au Nord de la ville de Lomé, Mr Kokou sollicite un premier crédit à WAGES pour s'approvisionner en marchandises. Il a démarré en 2008. Marié, il est père de famille de 04 enfants dont 02 scolarisés. Le profit permettra à mr Kokou de rendre pérenne son activité et de permettre à la famille de s'épanouir.
texts.en: A retailer of cement in AGOE, a town located north of the city of Lomé, Mr. Kokou is requesting an initial loan from WAGES to stock up on merchandise (cement). He began in 2008. He is a married father of four children, of whom two are in school. The profits will enable Mr. Kokou to make his business sustainable and allow his family to thrive.

loans.use: to purchase cement to sell

loans.name: Hermes

texts.en:
Hermes earns a living with his barber shop in San Miguel, Bohol. He has been in the business for more than 3 years, and this is the source of his income.
